Product Name: Certikin Aquaspeed 2 Speed Swimming Pool Pump
Product Description:
Certikin Aquaspeed 2 Speed Swimming Pool Pump (AQP2151N)

The Certikin Aquaspeed AQP2151N is a 1.5HP (1.1kW) single phase 2 speed pump for swimming pool or spa use.

For ease of use the Aquaspeed AQP2151N has a clear lid for inspection of the pump basket and is supplied with 2" quick connect unions for simple installation.

Suitable for salt water swimming pools the Certikin Aquaspeed range of pumps are constructed from a single piece fibreglass body for durability and corrosion resistance. Featuring a hydraulically efficient impellor and diffuser design for maximum output with minimum turbulence.

 

 Aquaspeed Pool Pump Features:-

  • Suitable for salt chlorinated swimming pool
  • Corrosion resistant and UV stabilised fibreglass pump body
  • Easy inspection of pump basket with clear lid
  • TUV approved
  • 316 high grade mechanical seal with secondary seal to protect the pump motor
  • Efficient impeller and diffuser design to maximize output with minimum turbulence

Product Name: Truma Saphir Comfort Under Bench Air Conditioning Unit
Product Description:
Truma Saphir Comfort RC Under Bench Air Conditioning & Heating Unit


The Truma Saphir Comfort RC Under Bench air conditioning unit is not only the smallest and lightest unit in its class, but also features the ability to supply heat to your mobile living space. Featuring a powerful 2400w cooling unit alongside an equally impressive 1700w heating element, the Truma Saphir Comfort RC Under Bench air conditioning and hearing unit is the perfect solution for small to medium caravans and motorhomes measuring upto 6.5m in length.

Truma Saphir Comfort RC Specification and Features:

  • Incredibly powerful cooling performance: 2400 W.
  • Equally powerful heating system: 1700 W.
  • Automatic heating and cooling for continuous climate control.
  • The smallest unit in its class.
  • Practical timer function.
  • Compatible with the Truma iNet System.
  • Suitable for vehicles upto 6.5m in length.
  • Lightweight at just 23.5kg.

Temperature control at your fingertips!

The Saphir Comfort RC under bench air conditioning also features a digital remote control for convenient activation of the unit and setting of the desired ambient temperature, as well as an automatic timer function. When paired with an optional network controller unit (sold separately), the Saphir Comfort RC under bench air conditioning unit is also fully compatible with the Truma iNet control system allowing the unit to be controlled via an app installed on a compatible mobile phone or tablet*.

* Optional iNet controller sold separately, compatible with some Android and iPhone/iPad devices.

Truma Saphir Comfort RC typical installation diagram.

Additional benefits of the Truma Saphir Comfort RC

  • 2400 W of cooling power for optimum air cooling and humidity reduction.
  • Ideal for allergy sufferers thanks to the pollen filter that is fitted as standard.
  • Cooling time of up to 15 hours can be programmed in advance.
  • Completely maintenance-free thanks to the closed refrigeration circuit.
  • Better vehicle handling because of the way the air conditioning system is installed close to the floor.
Product Availability: The Truma Saphir Comfort AC is sent on a next working day carrier!
Category: Caravan, Campervan & Motorhome/Heaters and Air Conditioners/Air Conditioners;Caravan, Campervan & Motorhome

Product Name: Bestway Lay-Z-Spa Siena Inflatable Hot tub
Product Description:
The Bestway Lay-Z-Spa Siena

Relax and chill out being massaged with 127 Air Jets creating thousands of refreshing bubbles

Unavailable until further notice

A relaxing Italian evening for two

If you’re looking for a romantic night in with your partner then look no further than the 2-person Lay-Z-Spa Siena Inflatable hot tub. With extra length for reclining, it’s never been easier to let the world go by and blissfully waste away a luxurious day or night in your own home.

Designed for Two

The Lay-Z-Spa Siena AirJet is a dedicated 2-person spa, perfect for a peaceful evening with that special person, or just treat yourself.

All-Surrounding AirJet Massage System

The Lay-Z-Spa Siena has a rejuvenating massage system consisting of 127 all-surrounding air jets.

40°C Rapid Heating System

With the latest integrated technology you can heat your Siena hot tub, run the massage system and filter the water simultaneously using just the pump.

Energy Saving Timer

The energy saving timer not only saves energy by turning off the Bestway Lay-Z-Spa Siena when it’s not in use, but it also allows you to program your hot tub for when you get home.

Portable. Durable. Insulated.

The Lay-Z-Spa Siena AirJet can be set up practically anywhere with a flat surface. Its cushioned floor, inflatable walls and sturdy I-Beams construction offer superior structural stability and comfort, its premium leather look outer and inflatable lid provide protection and additional insulation. This spa is made from exclusive 3-ply reinforced Tritech™ material which provides superior strength and durability without sacrificing on comfort.

Product Name: Reimo Isoflex VW T5 & T6 Thermal Cab Window Blinds
Product Description:
Reimo Isoflex VW T5 & T6 Thermal Cab Window Blinds

Insulated blinds set for VW vans and campervans

The Reimo Isoflex Tailgate Thermal Cab Window Blinds for VW T5 & T6 is made from 9 layer Isoflex material. Designed to fit the cab windows of the Volkswagen T5 and T6 2003 onwards. Easily installed with the included suction cups, simply stick to the inner glass of your cab window for added privacy and temperature control. Our thermal blinds use a 9 layer system of mattresses and fibres, which trap heat inside your vehicle.

Keep your van comfortable in any climate with a thermal blinds set. These thermal curtains are designed to provide protection against both the heat and the cold, keeping conditions inside your campervan cosy. Available as a three piece set that covers the whole windscreen and both driver and passenger side windows.

Insulation doesn't only help in winter - it actually helps to trap in colder air in summer, resisting the heat from outside your vehicle. The aluminium foil backing reflects the sun's UV rays, keeping your vehicle cool in the summer.

Reimo Isoflex Key Features:

  • 9 layer Isoflex material (PVC)
  • Reflection of solar radiation
  • Insulation against hot and cold
  • Also acts as a privacy screen
  • Mount with included suction cups
  • Suitable for VW T5 & T6 2003 onwards
  • Helps to prevent condensation
  • Supplied with carry bag for easy storage and reduced creasing
Product Availability: Sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Description:
Mosquito net for sliding door of VW T5 or T6 Kombi-Bus for models from 2003 onwards

Fine-woven mosquito net, to keep out mosquitoes and other small insects.

Other benefits

Long lasting, high quality black fabric, giving shade and keeping your van cool in strong sunshine. The fabric allows good visibility outwards and great air circulation. The mosquito net is UV-resistant, made from a flame-retardant flexible polyester woven material. The zip closures can be operated from inside and outside your van.

Closure and fittings

The Reimo mosquito net is fitted with Velcro strips at the sides, press studs at the top and a heavy lead strip ensures closure at the bottom - all these fittings are supplied with the net.

Product Description:
Coleman Performance Event Shelter Bundle

Perfect when entertaining in the garden, providing shelter at outdoor events or offering protection from the sun alongside your tent or caravan, these Coleman Performance Event Shelters provides a cosy, covered area perfect for large groups or families. Available in two sizes, these bundles are a fantastic temporary shelter for your outdoor events. With a stable and sturdy design and tested durable fabrics, you can enjoy more time outdoors with the Coleman Performance Event Shelter bundle.

Complete bundle set

The bundles include three side walls and a side wall with a door, providing a full enclosed area for greater weather protection and added privacy. For ease of transportation, the bundle also includes a carry bag with wheels.

Spacious protection

With a generous central headroom, wide side panels and a large shaded area of up to 20m² (with the XL version), this shelter can offer protection from the sun for families and large groups comfortably. The size makes it ideal for group camping acting as a communal area for dining or relaxing.

Please note that the Coleman Event Shelters are designed for occasional use such as short camping trips, weekend garden and sporting events and should not be used as a permanent or long term shelter solution.

Product Name: Thetford C263 Cassette Toilet for Caravans & Motorhomes
Product Description:
Thetford C263 Cassette Toilet


The C263 range of cassette toilets from Thetford provide permanent toilet solution combined with the convenience of a removable wasteholding tank and waste level indicator. Toilets in the Thetford C263 range features a removable wasteholding tank is accessed vial a small door on the outside of your vehicle for removal and emptying/cleaning. The C263S model features an external flush controller and the C263CS model features a built in rear-mounted flush controller.

Safety, cleanliness and convenience as standard.

As you expect from any Thetford product, the toilet is of a high quality construction. The Thetford C263 range features a vent button for use when emptying the cassette to prevent splashing, an automatic pressure release valve to prevent gasses from building up inside the tank, and a rotating spout for more convenience when emptying the contents.

What’s the difference between a CS & S?

The latest versions of the C220 and C260 Thetford Cassette toilets come with two designs, a CS and S but what’s the difference?

The CS has been around for some time and comes with “cistern” or back plate, this allows for the toilet to be surface mounted to the wall whilst also housing the control panel and flush button. The S does not come with a “cistern” and requires part of the toilet to be recessed into the wall including control panel and flush button to be wall mounted.

Product Name: Vision Plus TV Wall Mounting Caravan & Motorhome Brackets
Product Description:
Vision Plus TV Wall Mounting Bracket

Lightweight, strong and versatile

Vision Plus TV Wall Mounting Brackets are great for mounting TVs of up to 27".  For example, the Avtex or Vision Plus range of motorhome, campervan and caravan televisions can be suspended safely and securely by these brackets, saving you space in your campervan, caravan, motorhome or marine vehicle. TV brackets help to secure your television, ensuring it doesn't get damaged in transit.

The perfect bracket for any campervan, motorhome, caravan or boat

Vision Plus produce TV wall mounting brackets with single, double and triple arms, as well as a short arm version and an optional quick release bracket. Brackets with extra arms allow you to adjust the position of your television further, giving the arms extra reach while still folding flat against the wall.

Quick release compatible

Vision plus supply their Tv wall mounting swing arms with quick release brackets, making it easy to stow away or move your campervan or caravan 12v television. Friction-adjustable hinges also ensure that your arm is never too loose or too stiff, ensuring it moves only when you want it to.

Short/Single/Double/Triple arm features:

  • Includes quick release bracket
  • Friction-adjustable hinges to resist or stop movement
  • Lock secures TV from movement when in transit
  • VESA compliant for 75mm and 100mm mounting
  • 10 degrees of TV tilt available upwards or downwards
  • Cable management clips each side of the arm
  • SHORT: Extends 84mm from the wall. Lightweight 0.4kg design
  • SINGLE: Extends up to 174mm away from the wall, and only 84mm when folded away. Lightweight 0.7kg design
  • DOUBLE: Extends up to 264mm away from the wall, and only 84mm when folded away. Lightweight 0.83kg design
  • TRIPLE: Extends up to 354mm away from the wall, and only 84mm when folded away. Lightweight 0.97kg design
  • Made of glass-enriched nylon
  • Compatible with TVs of up to 24" and 7.5kg

Vision Plus Quick release TV bracket Features:

  • First plate fixes to TV, while second plate fixes to wall mount bracket
  • Removing TV simply involves pressing a tab and sliding it out
  • Can also be used directly as a wall bracket
  • Compatible with all VESA 75mm and 100mm brackets
  • For televisions of up to 24"
  • Max load 15kg

 Please Note: Image one, showing all variants, shows the discontinued short arm and single arm brackets. Please see images 5-10 images of the current models

Product Description:
Vango Atmos 115 Camping Table

The Vango Atmos 115cm Folding Camp Table

The Vango Atmos 115 Table is a stunning piece of outdoor furniture that perfectly blends form and function. With its sleek, modern design and lightweight yet sturdy construction, this table is the ultimate outdoor accessory for campers and caravan owners alike. Crafted with a lightweight but durable aluminum frame complete with a quality powder coated finish, the Atmos 115 Table is designed to withstand the elements. The table top is made from a high-strength, heat-resistant resin material that can withstand hot pots and pans without warping or melting.

Easy levelling

With its easily adjustable table legs, varying the height of the table to suit your dining requirements is quick and easy. Also, as each table leg can be independently adjusted, an uneven camping or caravan pitch is no longer a problem to having a stable table.  The adjustable legs make the Vango Atmos 115 an incredibly versatile table useful for a variety of outdoor activities. Whether you're enjoying a picnic in the park, cooking up dinner at your campsite, or just relaxing with friends and family in your garden, this table is the perfect accessory.

Lightweight design

What really sets the Atmos 115 Table apart is its compact and lightweight design. When folded up, the table is small enough to fit in a cupboard space or under furniture in your caravan, campervan or motorhome. This makes making it easy to take with you on all your adventures ready to pull out when needed. 

Features and Specifications

  • Variable height settings
  • Adjustable feet for stabilising on uneven surfaces
  • Folds flat for space saving
  • Aluminium frame
  • Resin heatproof table top
  • Easy to clean surfaces
  • Maximum load of 30 Kilos
  • Dimensions L x W x H: 115 x 70 x 75cm
  • Packsize L x W x H: 115 x 5 x 70cm
  • Weight 7.6 Kilos
  • Granite Grey colour

Product Name: Mini Caravan Boat Combination Camper Van
Product Description:
Boat/Van Mini Caravan and Boat Combination

It's the little caravan that wants to be a boat, or is it the other way around!

It's like a caravan, it's like a boat, it's both.  This Caravan Boat transformer gives you best of both worlds all in one attractive package.  It's your choice, head for a weekend mini caravan break with the option of taking to the water.  Can comfortably sleep 2 with the bed converting into 2 double benches for 4 people.  Optimized for Water Leisure. Please note the boat van is for use on lakes, the high seas are not an option!  Regulations regarding use in the UK will be added to this page shortly.

Tailgate Rear Door

The rear tailgate style door is opened at 90 degrees utilizing the linear line of the boat and exposong the teak pattern floor deck where you can relax and enjoy the water or maybe take in some fishing.

 This page is still under construction

 

 

Boat Van Specifications

  1. AL-KO Waterproof Axel
  2. Rear deck allows for small outdoor motor to be mounted
  3. Bluetooth audio (optional)
  4. Mains Hook Up
  5. Handy rear storage compartments that double up as seats
  6. Integrated electricity controll point
  7. Handy platform ladder which can be raised out of the way
  8. Single burner with integrated sink
  9. Sony waterproof speakers (optional)
  10. Solar Panel Charging with when electricity is not available (optional)
  11. Flip down support legs
  12. Generous under bench storage space for your camping gear.
  13. CTEK Battery Charger (Sweden)
  14. Small diving deck at the front, teak pattern floor deck at the rear. (optional)
  15. Living room in the daytime, double bed at night
  16. Jockey Wheel
  17. Pop-up roof providing extra head room on land or afloat also provides ventilation
  18. LED combination rear high visibility lights
  19. Length (mm) 4,600, Width (mm) 2,190 Height (mm) 2,040 Weight (kg) 740
  20. Number of passengers 4

 
Basic Specifications also include

Table, LED touch interior light, 100A Deep Cycle Battery, Platform Ladder, USB and 12V Cigar Jack, teak pattern lower rear deck, Polycarbonate sliding Chinese door, Outrigger, roll blinds and mosquito nets, 15inch AL wheels

Other Optional

Tokido Electric Motor (3hp) Mercury 2-cycle engine (4.9hp) 4,600mm

Prices

To be added in due course, as a guidline the basic model will come in somewere in the region of £20,000 subject to currency rates in the new year.

For more information call us on 0151 334 0222

Product Name: Coleman Meadowood 4L Blackout Poled Family Tunnel Tent
Product Description:
Coleman Meadowood 4L Blackout Family Tunnel Tent

The Coleman Meadowood 4L tent presents a generous and simple to use 4 person tunnel tent with a larger living area than its stablemate the Meadowood 4 and is designed for families or couples wanting a bit of extra space on their camping holidays. It provides a cozy spacious area for living and has a large porch entrance. Perfect for enjoying the great outdoors.

Blackout Technology Bedrooms

With Coleman's exclusive Blackout Bedroom technology, this specifically designed fabric blocks daylight from the sleeping area. This helps to keep the bedroom area cooler and darker for longer, making sleeping that bit easier and more comfortable.

Strong construction and materials

With a high waterproof rating, taped seems and sewn-in groundsheet, the Coleman Meadowood 4L tent keeps the wind, rain and bugs out ensuring a comfortable stay. The tough, fire retardant material and strong fibreglass poles make for a robust and safe tent. For those sunny days, the external flysheet is also SPF50 rated for protection from the sun.

Spacious size and design features

With generous bedroom sizes, a large living area, zipped curtains and multiple entrances, the Meadowood 4L Tunnel Tent has all the features needed making it ideal for family holidays and weekend breaks. The front door also offers a barrier free entrance for easier access. 

Coleman Meadowood 4L Blackout Tunnel Tent Specification

  • 2 Bedrooms
  • 4 berth
  • Waterproof Rating: 4000mm
  • Fibreglass poles
  • Dimensions: 300 x 630 x 210cm
  • Pack size: 74 x 36 x 36cm
  • Weight: 22.5kg
  • Blackout Bedroom Technology

Product Name: SunnCamp Swift Air SC Caravan Awning
Product Description:
SunnCamp Swift Air SC Caravan Awning

Great value porch awning

The new SunnCamp Swift Air SC caravan awning provides a simple and practical porch for your caravan. The design features a roll-up front door with canopy option (canopy poles available separately). Two side doors improve air flow within and curtains for all windows add privacy to the awning. Each model is Side Sun Canopy Compatible for added protection from sun when in and around your caravan. The Sun Side Canopy can be purchased separately.

Available in various awning lengths

Depending upon the length of your caravan, there is a range of sizes best suited to your needs. All SunnCamp Swift Air SC models have an awning rail height of between 235-250cm.

 SunnCamp Swift Air SC caravan awning features:-

  • Curtains on all windows
  • Roll-up front door
  • 2 air flow side doors
  • Pump with pressure gauge
  • Caravan awning draught skirt
  • Storm buckles and straps
  • Vertical storm pole (390 model only)
  • LED Light Pocket for optional LED Light System (390 & 325 models only)
These awnings will fit a caravan height of 235 - 250cm

Product Name: Vango Cruz III Motorhome Campervan Air Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Vango Cruz III Drive Away Awning

Vango air beam awning for campervan and motorhome

The Vango Cruz III Motorhome drive away AirAway awning is constructed from Vango Sentinel Pro 420 fabric for durability and comfort. The versatile pre-angled Vango Super Beams provide stability with an increased headroom and inner living space. The Vango Cruz motorhome drive away awning provides a versatile half and half door enabling either more shelter or ventilation in the awning. The front extension overhang allows for storage of muddy boots and protection from the weather. The Cruz AirAway awning features a door in the connecting tunnel to allow easy access in and out of your motorhome campervan whilst still allowing the connection to function as a utility room.

Vango Cruz Awning Features:

  • Vango Sentinel Pro 420 ripstop polyester fabric 
  • Pre-angled AirBeams for greater internal space
  • Double action pump with pressure dial
  • Fully sewn-in groundsheet
  • Fully taped seams on flysheet and groundsheet
  • High and low level ventilation panels 
  • Diamond Clear windows with zipped privacy curtains
  • Door in the connecting panel between campervan and motorhome awning
  • Tension Band System ensures awning performs in strong winds
  • Fire retardant fabrics 
  • Two year warranty

 Vango Cruz Air Awning Includes:

  • Oversized bag with tensioning straps to easily pack away your awning
  • Multiple attachments: 6mm kador strip, roof straps and roof bar tabs
  • Double Action Pump
  • Steel ground pegs
  • Mallet
  • Storm straps

Vango Cruz III Low Specifications

  • Height to roof rail 180cm-210cm
  • Size of Pack  78cm x 37cm x 38cm
  • Weight 23.6kg
  • Protex 420 RipStop Groundsheet
  • Pitch time appx 10 minutes

Vango Cruz III Tall Specifications

  • Height Adjustable 245cm-295cm
  • Kador Length 248cm
  • Pack Size 78cm x 37cm x 38cm
  • Protex 420 RipStop Groundsheet
  • Pitch time appx 10 minutes

The standard fixing for the Drive Away Kit is 6mm x 6mm however if you have a Fiamma awning you will require the 4mm x 6mm - Please click here to select the drive away kit you require.
Product Warranty: Vango Cruz III drive away awning comes with a two year warranty from the date of purchase. Register your new awning with Vango online to extend it to three years.

Product Name: Vango Cove II Campervan Drive Away Awning Bundle
Product Description:
Vango Cove II Drive Away Campervan Awning Bundle

The Vango Cove II Awning bundle combines a drive away awning, carpet and groundsheet protector for a complete package. Available to fit  campervan models like the VW T5/T6, Ford Custom or similar sized vehicles with a poled or air low version, or taller campervans with the Cove II Air Mid model. These drive away awning bundles come complete and ready to pitch on your next holiday or trip away.

Vango Cove II Drive Away Awning

The Vango Cove II is a perfect drive away awning for relaxing besides your campervan. With a main awning opening that is faces the same direction as your campervan, you can be sure of a great view from your pitch and added privacy within your campervan. An ideal size for couples and small families, this drive away awning makes for an excellent space when used with your campervan. Being a free-standing design, this adds to the flexibility of disconnecting from your campervan allowing you to go off and explore for the day. If you have an extra guest on your holiday, an optional inner bedroom is available too. For added vehicle compatibility, the drive away awning comes with pre-attached 6mm kador, 8 Metre over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole & clamp kit system.

Vango Cove II Drive Away Awning Features: 

  • Lightweight Powerflex fibreglass poles or pre-angled Airbeam frame (depending on model)
  • Sentinel Active fabric 
  • Diamond clear windows with toggled privacy curtains
  • Lantern hanging points
  • Internal mesh front door panel for bug free ventilation
  • Steel pegs and handy carry bag
  • Sewn in groundsheet
  • Two doors in tunnel attachment for front and back entry
  • Roll away connecting tunnel

Vango Cove II Low Poled Specification:

  • Weight: 13.2kg
  • Pack size: L75 x H31 x W31 cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 10 mins
  • Kador Adjustable Height: 180-210 cm
  • Kador Length: 260 cm
  • Frame Type: Powerflex Fibreglass

Vango Cove II Low Air Specification:

  • Total Weight 15.1kg
  • Pack size: L74 x H39 x W39 cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 10 mins
  • Kador Adjustable Height: 180-210 cm
  • Kador Length: 260 cm
  • Frame Type: Airbeam Frame

Vango Cove II Mid Air Specification:

  • Total Weight 15.6kg
  • Pack size: L74 x H39 x W39 cm
  • Pitching Time: Approx. 10 mins
  • Kador Adjustable Height: 215-255 cm
  • Kador Length: 260 cm
  • Frame Type: Airbeam Frame

Vango Kela Pro Air Inflatable Awning
Product Description:
Vango Kela Pro Air Drive Away Awning

Vango AirBeam Awning for Campervan and Motorhomes

The new and improved Vango Kela Pro Air provides a lightweight and robust driveaway awning perfect for weekend breaks or extended holidays. Designed for easy attachment to your campervan or motorhome, this inflatable awning offers a waterproof and robust area for relaxing and socialising, plus with the AirBeam inflatable construction, pitching takes a matter of minutes.

Bright and ventilated space

With Diamond Clear side windows, Skylight roof windows along the roofline and large mesh covered doors, this is a great drive awning for allowing plenty of light into your living area. Whether you're wanting to take in the views from your pitch or do a spot of star gazing late in the evening, the Vango Kela Pro Air gives you the flexibility and options to make the most of the great outdoors. Furthermore, the front facing layout of the awning provides a living space with a main door that faces the direction of the campervan or motorhome.

Kela Pro Air Awning Features

  • Double Ripstop 420 fabric with a waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH
  • TBS II Tension Band System and Bracer Beams for improved stability
  • Large Skylight Windows for extra daylight and better stargazing
  • Skytrack II System for suspended lighting and useful storage
  • 10 Sky Hooks included for storage
  • Zipped privacy curtains for improved awning privacy
  • King Pole Door can be used as a canopy with an additional king pole (optional)
  • Pre-angled beams provide improved internal space and improves stability
  • Cable entry point
  • Twin door tunnel entrance for greater versatility
  • Roll away connecting tunnel
  • Multi vehicle attachment methods
  • Available in three connection (kador) height sizes

Vango Kela Pro Air Specifications

  • Kador Height Range Adjustable 180 to 295cm (Model Dependant)
    • Low: 180 - 210cm
    • Mid: 215 - 255cm
    • Tall: 255 - 295cm
  • Kador length 248cm
  • Packsize (Approx) 78 x 34 x 32cm
  • AirBeam inflatable tube frame
  • Pitch time appx 8 minutes
Product Availability: Vango Kela Pro is sent via next working day delivery

Product Name: Vango Galli III Air Low Campervan and Motorhome Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Vango Galli III Air Drive Away Campervan Awning

Vango Galli Drive Away Campervan and Motorhome AirAway Awning

The Vango Galli III Air is a spacious driveaway awning designed for anyone looking for a large and versatile space to enjoy their outdoor holiday in a campervan or motorhome. The driveaway awning is designed to be used with campervans and provides a wide range of usage opitions, such as setting up extra bed-rooms, a social space or a storage space, perfect for families or big groups who are on a trip. The awning is suitable for a variety of vehicles, the Galli III Air

A driveaway awning packed with technological innovation

Vango are leaders in pole-free pitching technology, and this driveaway campervan awning is no different as it is equipped with Vango's AirBeam Pole-free Technology. This means that the Galli III Campervan Awning is spacious, convenient and provides an open floor plan when fully set up. The AirBeam Pump that is included allows for rapid inflation, meaning that installation and set-up of the awning will take around 15 minutes. This technology makes the Galli III motorhome awning quick, easy and convenient to set-up. To ensure that you are using the pump correctly, it comes with a pressure dial to measure the pressure, and a carry-on bag to facilitate easy tidying and storage when not in use.

SuperBeam Technology means that the campervan awning uses beams that are larger in diameter then on average, this helps to provide extra security and stability.

The Galli III Air Drivaway Campervan Awning also utilises SkyTrack technology. This is a flexible hanging ssystem which allows users to easily attach storage solurions or extra lighting. The Galli III Air comes witth a pack of 10 key hooks which are easy to slide on to the SkyTracck system.

Vango Galli III Drive Away Awning Features:

• Covered porch entry – keeps rain out of the living area
• Sky Track II System - flexible hanging system to attach lighting, sky liners and storage solutions
• Two mesh doors - help keep bugs out
• Skylight Windows - enhance light during the day and enjoy star gazing at night
• High Visibility Guy lines with tidies

• SuperBeam technology - create space and rely on sturdy construction
• Sentinel Pro Fabric - double ripstop construction, UV resistant and highly waterproof
• Low Level Ventilation - reduces condensation
• Diamond clear windows - for maximum light and clear visibility
• Fully sewn in groundsheet - flat entry for easy access to wheelchairs and pushchairs
• Zipped Curtains - for added privacy in your awning
• Power cable entry point and tidies

Vango Galli Air Campervan Awning Includes:

• Oversized bag with tensioning straps to easily pack away your awning
• Multiple attachments: 6mm kador strip, roof straps and roof bar tabs
• Double Action Pump
• Steel ground pegs
• Mallet
• Storm straps

Optional Extras:

• Footprint groundsheet protector GP003
• Carpet CP100
• Inner tent bedroom BR001
• Drive away fixing kit - The standard fixing kit is 6mm x 6mm. However, if you have a Fiamma awning you will require a 4mm x 6mm kit. Click here to select the drive away kit you require.

Vango Galli Dimensions Low

• Pack size: 78cm x 39cm x 44cm (awning and accessories)
• Weight: 28.95kg
• Kador height: 180-210cm
• Kador length 250cm
• Pitching time: approx. 15 minutes

Vango Galli Dimensions Tall

• Pack size: 78cm x 43cm x 45cm (awning and accessories)
• Weight: 29.00kg
• Kador height: 245-295cm
• Kador length: 290cm
• Pitching time: approx. 15 minutes
Product Warranty: The Vango Galli III drive away awning comes with a two year warranty from the date of purchase. Register your new awning with Vango online to extend it to three years.

Webasto TB31 Campervan Caravan Compressor Travel Box
Product Description:
Webasto TB31 Campervan Caravan Compressor Travel Box

The Webasto range of Travel Boxes are a perfect accompaniment to your Campervan, Motorhome or Caravan, where perhaps space is at a premium and a regular front or top loading Webasto fridge is impractical.

Cooling Capabilities

With the ability to match built in refrigerator temperatures, or even to be used as a freezer (to minus18 degrees c).this is a Campervan, caravan, or motorhome travel box with real cooling capability.

Efficient and Smart

The highly efficient Secop/Danfoss compressor, and it's high tech energy saving function (ECO), turbo function, (MAX), and multifunction electronic thermostat, allow an easy and economic management of the fridge through a check and a reduction of consumptions, ensuring your campervan, caravan or motorhome battery isn't highly taxed in operation. The electronic board AC/DC Secop converter allows a DC 12/24V or an AC 115-230V supply. The switching between DC and AC is automatic when your campervan is on electric hook up.

Battery Protection

Three levels of battery protection come as standard to protect your motorhomes' auxiliary battery

Features and Specifications

  • Type TB31 AC/DC
  • Energy Efficiency Class A+
  • Power consumption (Ah in 24hours) 0.76 Ah per hour at 12vDC
  • Weight 18kg
  • Gross Volume 29 Litres
  • External Dimensions 380mm x 585mm x 350mm
  • Internal Dimensions 290mm x 315mm x 270mm
  • Danfoss/Secop BD35 compressor

All WEBASTO Travel Boxes come with a 3 year warranty for your peace of mind
Product Availability: The Webasto TB31 Travel Cool Box is sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Webasto TB41 Campervan Motorhome Compressor Travel Box
Product Description:
Webasto TB41 Campervan Motorhome Compressor Travel Box

The Webasto TB41 Travel Box is the mid-sized Compressor travel box for your Motorhome, Campervan or Caravan

Cooling Capabilities

The TB41 Campervan Travel Box achieves temperatures just like a regular compressor motorhome or caravan refrigerator does, utilising the same compressor as is to be found in the Webasto Cruise elegance range, and the Waeco CRX range of fridges. even freezing (to minus 18 degrees c if required)

Intelligent and efficient

With its high tech, energy saving ECO function, and TURBO function (Max), the multi-function electronic thermostat communicates economic power management of your Campervan Travel box ensuring that your Motorhome or Caravan battery isn't damaged or depleted totally.

3 stage battery protection

Keeping your batteries safe with 3 stage battery protection across the TB range of Campervan Travel boxes.

Automatic power source selection

The TB41 can switch between 115-230v AC and 12/24 volts automatically in your Motorhome or Caravan, switching between AC when on hook up, and 12/24v DC when off site.

Practicality

Product Name: Igloo Trailmate Marine 66 Litre Wheeled Cool Box
Product Description:
The Igloo Trailmate Marine Wheeled Cool Box

Fishing or messing about on your boat or just camping, anywhere is fine with this ultimate all-terrain marine cooler. Whether traversing sand hills, rocky shores, bumpy boat docks, you're in good company with the Igloo Trailmate Marine Cool Box.

66 Litre Capacity

With its 66 litre capacity the Trailmate Marine can keep 112 12oz drinks cans cold with its Ultratherm® Technology built into the lid and body.

Igloo Trailmate Marine Wheeled Cool Box Features

  • UV Inhibitors - Protect the cooler against sun damage so you can stay outdoors from sun up to sunset.
  • Oversized Wheels help the Igloo Trailmate Marine Wheeled Cool Box tackle sand and other challenging terrain with the superior traction and ground clearance of 10-inch, never-flat, non-marking wheels.
  • Glide™ Handle, pull your load 50% easier thanks to the comfort and leverage of the locking, telescopic, horizontal handle.
  • Antimicrobial Liner - Treated liner inhibits stains and odors caused by bacteria, easing cleanup and extending product life
  • Comfort Grip Handle - Swing-up handle works with closed telescoping handle for lifting and loading/unloading.
  • Anti-Skid - Non-marking tread won't means the Igloo Trailmate Marine Wheeled Cool Box won't leave scuff marks and is ideal for boat decks.
  • Butler Tray - Serve up drinks and snacks away from sand and dirt on our removable butler tray, which stores easily under the cooler's lid when not in use.
  • Bottle Openers - Dual built-in bottle openers at your fingertips makes it easy to enjoy your drinks.
  • Food Basket - Suspended interior food basket keeps food cold and dry.
  • The Igloo Trailmate Marine Cool Box has removable accessory holders to transport and add additional support for beach umbrellas or fishing rods.
  • Cup Holders - Keep your cold ones secure and always in arms reach.
  • Tie-Down Loops - Easily haul beach chairs, umbrellas and other accessories by strapping them right to the cooler.
  • Stainless Steel Parts - stainless-steel rust-resistant screws.
  • Aluminium Construction - Trust in the lightweight, rust-resistant strength of marine-grade aluminium parts for the handle and skid rails.
  • Dry Storage - From public beaches to lakes, keep essentials like mobile phones, keys and sunglasses handy and dry inside our water-resistant, lockable box with an anti-leak gasket.
  • Storage Pocket - Stash your shades, sunscreen and other essentials easily and securely.
  • Drain Plug - Threaded drain plug is garden hose compatible and features a non-slip, easy-grip tethered cap.
  • Cool Riser Technology™ - Improves cooling performance by elevating cooler from hot surfaces.
  • Ultratherm - Fully insulated for advanced cooling performance.
  • Ice Retention - Insulated body and lid provide up to 4 days ice retention (checked under controlled test conditions).

Igloo Trailmate Marine Wheeled Cool Box Specifications

  • Capacity 112 x 12oz cans, 66 litres
  • Ice Retention Days 4
  • The Igloo Trailmate Marine Weighs: 15.74kg
  • Exterior Dimensions: 34.59" L x 19.7" W x 23.61" D
  • Exterior Dimensions: 87.86cm L x 50.04cm W x 59.97cm D

Product Name: Igloo Super Tough STX-54 51 Litre Coolbox Ice Cooler
Product Description:
Igloo Super Tough STX-54 51 Litre Coolbox Ice Cooler

Note: The Igloo Super Tough STX 54 has now been discontinued and replaced by the BMX 52 

Market-leading cooling performance

Designed and manufactured to the highest standards in the US, the Igloo Super Tough STX-54 is the perfect solution for keeping your drinks and food suitably chilled in a range of environments. Featuring market-leading Ultratherm insulation in both the lid and the body, it can keep ice frozen for up to 4 days! In addition to this, the Igloo Super Tough STX-54 features Cool Riser Technology that improves cooling performance.

Incredibly strong and built to last!

Built for strength and durability, the Igloo Super Tough STX-54 features handles that are not only comfortable to hold thanks to their soft-grip, but also bolted through the body ensuring the handles won't pull out regardless of how heavy the box and its contents are, heavy-duty stainless steel hinges, and dual stainless steel straps to support the lid and hinges when the cooler box is open.

Handy features to maximise convenience

A recessed drain plug is fitted to the Igloo Super Tough STX-54 which allows easy draining of melted ice, and for keen anglers a handy measuring ruler is moulded into the lid to give you an indication as to whether you should keep a catch or throw it back!

Specifications

  • Bolt-through-body, comfort-grip side handles won't pull out, even under heavy loads
  • Extra-durable dual stainless-steel latch keeps contents secure
  • Specially anchored, heavy-duty stainless steel hinges stand up to abuse
  • 40% heavier body for rugged durability
  • Ultratherm insulation in body and lid keeps ice frozen up to 4 days
  • Dual stainless-steel straps support lid and hinges when cooler is open
  • Cool Riser Technology improves cooling performance by elevating away from hot surfaces
  • Recessed, triple-snap drain plug is leak resistant and allows you to easily drain melted ice
  • Fish-measuring ruler molded into lid tells you if you should keep it or throw it back
  • Made in the USA!

 

Jacksons Leisure Supplies is proud to be an official distributor of Igloo Products in the UK.

Product Name: Vango Airhub Hexaway Pro Air Campervan Motorhome Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Vango Airhub Hexaway Pro Air Drive Away Awning 

The perfect awning for socialising in your campervan

The Airhub Hexaway Pro Air Drive Away Awning takes the popularity of the Airhub Hex II to a new level with the new Sentinel ECO Pro fabric. Constructed from recycled single-use materials and with the easily inflated yet robust Single Inflation Point AirBeam design, the Hexaway Pro Air awning provides a great area for socialising alongside your campervan or motorhome. With multiple vehicle attachment methods provided as standard, the Hexaway Pro Air is quick and easy to attach to your motorhome or campervan each and every time. Connection methods include 6mm kador, generous over vehicle straps and roof bar attachment tabs.

Convenience and simplicity

Vango Airhub Hexaway Pro Air features Vango's Single Inflation Point technology and, along with the AirBeam Pump, makes inflating the awning quick and easy with a pitchtime of around 10 minutes for most users. The detached tunnel entrance is simply rolled away for when you go exploring in your campervan or motorhome for the day, allowing you to simply return alongside your awning in the same parking position to reattach. The Vango Hexaway Pro Air comes in three convenient tunnel connection height options, suitable for campervans or motorhomes between 180 and 295cm.

Extra features as standard

The Hexaway Pro Air awnings provides multiple features to make your holidays easier and more comfortable. From Diamond Clear Windows, Skylight roof windows and ventilation panels for extra ventilation, to high visibility guylines and adjustable pegging point straps for a secure pitch, the Hexaway Pro Air makes for a great drive away awning. The spacious interior offers a great area for dining or socialising, and the tall pre-angled beams provide plenty of headroom and a feeling of space.

Airhub Hexaway Pro Air Awning Features:

  • Double Ripstop material constructed from recycled single use plastics
  • Waterproof rated at 6,000mm Hydrostatic Head
  • ColourLok technology to help retain fabric colour
  • Easy Access Doors for prams, wheelchairs and other mobility issues 
  • SkyTrack II flexible hanging system with 10 Sky Hooks included
  • Steel rock pegs included
  • Skylight Windows for improved natural light
  • High visibility guylines
  • Zipped privacy curtains
  • Alternating Diamond Clear and mesh windows
  • Multi vehicle attachment tunnel
Product Warranty: 2 Year manufacturers warranty. Extend your awning warranty to 3 years by registering online with Vango
Product Availability: Fast delivery options available!

Rapide by name, rapid by nature!

The Vango Rapide II awning has been designed from the outset for speed and convenience. With a single Vango Superbeam providing structure, and Vango's Sentinel Comfort 150 fabric, the Rapide is not only quick to setup, but also incredibly robust and strong.

Better design, better experience.

The Vango Rapide II has been updated for 2018 and is now constructed using grey-violet coloured fabric and features large diamond allowing for more natural light during the daytime. With zip-up curtains as standard, the awning also provides privacy when you need it.

Features for convenience.

It features a multifunction door allowing you to open it in various positions and even remove it complete. The Vango Rapide II is an awning that saves time and offers convenience whilst offering the usual quality you would expect from Vango.

Vango Sonoma II 350cm Air Caravan Motorhome Awning

Easy-to-pitch inflatable family awning

The Vango Sonoma II Caravan awning builds on the AirBeam Technology begun by Vango in 2011. New features include the SkyTrack II system for suspending lighting and storage, new grey and violet colour options, and design improvements including new skylight windows for extra daylight & stargazing options.

High Denier, High Tech Fabrics

The Vango Sonoma II Caravan Awning utilises High Denier, Sentinel Pro 420 Ripstop fabric and pre-angled super-beams for greater headroom and additional interior space. Diamond Clear windows, and the larger new skylights, make for a brighter, airier feel for your Sonoma II caravan awning.

Sonoma II 350 Awning Features:

  • NEW Skytrack II System for convenient storage and lighting options
  • Zipped patterned curtains for your added privacy
  • Flexi side doors which unzip at the top of your caravan awning to add ventilation, or to remove for your Sonoma II Annexe

Product Name: Astral Lumiplus RGB/Colour change LED Swimming Pool Light
Product Description:
Astral Lumiplus Par 56 RGB/Colour Change LED Swimming Pool Light

The Astral Lumiplus Par 56 RGB/Colour change LED with guts is supplied with 2.5 metres of cable. This efficient LED swimming pool underwater light uses up to 90% less electricity than the conventional bulb. With a long lifespan of up to 100,000 hours the Astral Lumiplus Colour change swimming pool light features maximum luminosity red, green blue LED's to achieve a wide array of vivid bright colours.

The Astral Lumiplus RGB Colour change LED swimming pool light and guts is available with a choice of white ABS or stainless steel faceplates and two power levels.

Astral recommend installation of one 27W light for every 20 square metres and one 48W for every 25 square metres of water surface.

Please note: You will require the Lumiplus RGB Light Receiver and remote control (sold separately) in order to use the colour change function.

Vango Galli III Drive Away Awning Bundle
Product Description:
Vango Galli III Inflatable Drive Away Awning Bundle

The Vango Galli Drive Away Awning Bundle Complete With Carpet and Footprint

Featuring a large, useful living space, the Vango Galli III drive away awning provides a roomy area for dining, relaxing or storage during your campervan or motorhome holidays. With generous height clearance throughout, the Galli Drive Away Awning can also accommodate two bedroom inner tents to add more flexibility and function to your campervan set up. Available in a poled or inflatable low version and a tall air only model, the Vango Galli III drive away awning is suitable for a range of campervan or motorhome vehicles with two generous kador fitting heights. For added compatibility, the drive away awning has Multiple Vehicle Attachment Methods, allowing attachment to your motorhome or campervan by a 6mm kador, roof bar attachment straps, and pole and clamp sleeve attachment. Two 8 metre over vehicle straps are also included for extra security.

Galli III Drive Away Awning Features

  • Roll away tunnel when detached from your campervan or motorhome
  • Sewn-in groundsheet to reduce drafts
  • Skylight windows along the roofline provide additional sunlight by day or stargazing by night (Airbeam Version)
  • Pre-angled AirBeam for improved headroom and extra internal space
  • Skytrack II and Sky Hooks system for storage and lighting suspension
  • Webbing storm straps as standard
  • TBS II - Tension Band System for increased stability in harsh conditions
  • AirBeam pump, pegs and carrybag included

Galli III Low Specification

  • Weight: 29 kg
  • Packed dimensions 78cm x 39cm x 44cm
  • Pitching time appx 15 minutes
  • Kador adjustable height: 180-210cm
  • Kador length: 250cm
  • Frame Type: AirBeam Inflatable Frame

Galli III Tall Specification

  • Weight: 29 kg
  • Packed dimensions 78cm x 43cm x 45cm
  • Pitching time appx 15 minutes
  • Kador adjustable height: 245-295cm
  • Kador length: 290cm
  • Frame Type: AirBeam Inflatable Frame

Product Name: Astral Lumiplus PAR 56 White LED Underwater Swimming Pool Light
Product Description:
Astral Lumiplus PAR 56 White LED Underwater Swimming Pool Light

The Astral Lumiplus PAR56 projectors are a reliable and efficient underwater LED pool light. This efficient white LED swimming pool underwater light uses up to 90% less electricity than a conventional bulb. With a long lifespan of up to 70-50,000 hours the Astral Lumiplus white LED swimming pool light provides an energy efficient solution for your swimming pool. They are compatible with AstralPool’s 230mm niches. Decorative rings are available in white, beige, grey or anthracite. The Astral Lumiplus Par 56 white LED light is supplied with 2.5 metres of cable.

Key Features:

  • Energy Efficient: Uses up to 90% less electricity compared to conventional bulbs
  • Long Lifespan: Operates for 50,000 to 70,000 hours, reducing the frequency of replacements
  • Temperature Colour: Provides a cool white light
  • Low Power Consumption: Rated at 14.5 W (20 VA), ideal for energy-conscious users
  • Compatibility: Fits AstralPool’s 230mm niches and is compatible with any PAR56 projector
  • Max Water Temperature: Suitable for water temperatures up to 40°C
  • Chemical Compatibility: Handles pool water with chlorine (up to 2 mg/l), bromine (up to 5 mg/l), and salt chlorination (up to 6 g/l), with a pH range of 7.2 to 7.6
  • Decorative Rings: Available in various colors including white, beige, grey, and anthracite for aesthetic customization
Product Availability: Delivery for Astral white LED is 2-4 days

Product Name: Vango Varkala Connect Caravan Airbeam Awning
Product Description:
Varkala Connect Caravan Airbeam Awning

Discontinued - see Vango Balletto Air Elements Awning

The Vango Varkala Connect is the latest of the Varkala caravan range. Designed with a new eye-catching contrasting grey. The flexible front doors can be unzipped from the top, and rolled to the side, or unzipped from the sides to store in their handy stitched in storage bags.

Flexibility of use

The living space can also be used for extra sleeping space by adding an inner bedroom to the Caravan awning (optional extra) and the living space can be extended by the addition of the Varkala Connect Extension, which comes as a left, or a right hand option.

High tech fabrics

Enjoy the peace of mind that comes from Sentinel Pro 420 RipStop fabric, and storm straps which come as standard, the easy clean weather shield skirt also reduces drafts, and the diamond clear windows allow more light during the day, and new bigger skylights for better night time star gazing.

Variants to suit your Caravan

The Vango Varkala Connect Caravan awning comes in 4 variations to ensure the best of fits to your caravan. Available in 280cm, 360cm, 420cm, and 520cm.

Features

  • Heavyweight zips on doors
  • SkyTrack System
  • PVC mud strip around base of awning

Product Name: Vango Faros II Low Drive Away Awning Bundle
Product Description:
Vango Faros II Low Drive Away Campervan Awning Bundle

The ever popular Faros II campervan awning is now available as a bundle deal including matching carpet and groundsheet protector for greater savings, convenience and comfort. These bundle deals are available on either the Poled or Air versions of the Faros II Low Drive Away awning. Simply choose your preferred awning frame structure from the Frame Type drop down above. The awning provides a space extra space alongside your campervan for enjoying long evenings or added shelter should the weather take a turn for the worse. Completing the bundle, a groundsheet protector helps to keep the underside of the drive away awning clean and dry, whilst the awning carpet adds warmth and comfort underfoot plus makes cleaning inside the awning easier. 

Vango Faros II Low Drive Away Awning

The Faros is the latest lightweight poled or Airbeam drive away awning tent from Vango. It features Vango's Sentinel Active quality fabric ensuring a compact pack size ideal for short breaks away without taking up unnecessary storage space. This drive away campervan awning can be left freestanding while you head out for the day and then easily reattached on your return thanks to its multi attachment options and simple double entry tunnel structure. The large front door with mesh panel creates a great living space making this awning a great addition to your vehicle on short breaks away.

Bundle contents:

  • Vango Faros II (Poled or Air version)
  • Vango Carpet
  • Vango Groundsheet (Footprint) Protector

Awning Features:

  • Vango Sentinel Active 62g/m2 fabric
  • Powerflex fibreglass poles (Poled Versions) or inflatable pre-angled Airbeam frame (Air Version), guy ropes and pegs are included
  • Covered front entrance 

Specifications:

  • Strong and reliable Vango structure
  • Flat Entry Groundsheet - for ease of access
  • TBS II Tension Band System ensures the awning performs in adverse weather conditions
  • Bracer Pole for added stability
  • Diamond Clear Windows maximise light and visibility to provide a bright and airy environment
  • Toggled Privacy Curtains that can be simply rolled away when not in use
  • Two Doors in Tunnel for variety of access
  • Roll Away Connecting Tunnel is quick and easy when you drive away for the day
  • Internal Mesh Front Door for bug free ventilation
  • Multiple Attachment Methods include pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole & clamp
  • Kador adjustable height: 180-210cm

Dimensions:

  • Packsize Poled - L75.0 x H27.0 x W27.0cm : Air - L75.0 x H34.0 x W34.0cm
  • Weight Poled 10.5kg - Air 11.9kg

Product Name: Campervan Window for Ford Transit 2015- Rear Barn Door
Product Description:
Campervan Windows for Ford Transit - Rear Barndoor

Bonded campervan windows for Ford Transit campers

Manufactured to the OEM standard, these high-quality glass windows are perfect for adding light to your campervan or work van. Compatible with the Ford Transit Custom, Tourneo, and Kombi. Bonded windows use a strong chemical connection to fix to the side of your campervan, creating a secure, flush and lightweight fitting. This is also the type of window and fitting which van manufacturers use in the factory.

Safe and secure

These campervan windows are tempered, which means in the event of an accident they will break into small pieces instead of large, sharp shards. This significantly reduces the risk of injury. Moreover, they are 'E' marked to demonstrate that they meet the European safety standard UN/ECE R43, which certifies them as safe for use in vehicles.

Maintain your campervan's privacy

With an 80% privacy tint, our windows ensure you feel just as comfortable in your van as before, while still letting in light. As well preserving your privacy, the tint reduces glare and UV from inside the van. 

Ford Transit Custom campervan window features:

  • Tempered glass breaks into small pieces instead of sharp shards in event of accident
  • Compliant with EU vehicle glass safety regulations
  • 80% tinted to preserve privacy and reduce UV and glare
  • Fritted glass - ceramic dot pattern at edges hides visibility of cut metal
  • Compatible with Ford Custom vans from 2015 onwards
Product Availability: Fast delivery options available!

Product Name: Renault Trafic Vauxhall Vivaro Bonded Glass Sliding Window - Driver's Side
Product Description:
Campervan Windows for Trafic/Vivaro - Bonded Privacy Glass Sliding Window

Driver's side sliding window for Renault Trafic, Vauxhall Vivaro, Nissan NV300 and Fiat Talento vans

Need some more light in your panel van conversion or work van? Manufactured to the OEM standard, this bonded van window is suitable for the Renault Trafic van platform, as well as its siblings the Vauxhall Vivaro, Nissan NV300 and Fiat Talento. These windows feature European 'E' marks, certifying that they meet European vehicular glass safety regulations.

Ideal for van conversions

Whether you are converting a Trafic or Vivaro Van into a campervan, or simply require more light in the Trafic van you work in, the Renault Trafic and Vauxhall Vivaro bonded windows are a neat, tidy and practical solution. The glass is also tempered, which means that in the case of an accident they will break into small pieces, instead of large, sharp shards.

Strength and privacy as standard

As with all our bonded windows, this bonded window for the Trafic or Vivaro models is tempered and features a permanent 80% tint which not only looks sleek, but also helps to reduce glare and UV in the van, as well as offering privacy to the user.

Compatible with the following vans:

  • Renault Trafic 2014-
  • Vauxhall Vivaro (same generation)
  • Nissan NV300 (same generation)
  • Fiat Talento (same generation)
Product Availability: In stock Renault Trafic bonded windows are sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Campervan Window for Ford Transit 2015- UK Passenger Side Front
Product Description:
Campervan Windows for Ford Transit - UK Passenger Side Front

Bonded campervan windows for Ford Transit campers

Manufactured to the OEM standard, these high-quality glass windows are perfect for adding light to your campervan or work van. Compatible with the Ford Transit Custom, Tourneo, and Kombi. Bonded windows use a strong chemical connection to fix to the side of your campervan, creating a secure, flush and lightweight fitting. This is also the type of window and fitting which van manufacturers use in the factory.

Safe and secure

These campervan windows are tempered, which means in the event of an accident they will break into small pieces instead of large, sharp shards. This significantly reduces the risk of injury. Moreover, they are 'E' marked to demonstrate that they meet the European safety standard UN/ECE R43, which certifies them as safe for use in vehicles.

Maintain your campervan's privacy

With an 80% privacy tint, our windows ensure you feel just as comfortable in your van as before, while still letting in light. As well preserving your privacy, the tint reduces glare and UV from inside the van. 

Ford Transit Custom campervan window features:

  • Tempered glass breaks into small pieces instead of sharp shards in event of accident
  • Compliant with EU vehicle glass safety regulations
  • 80% tinted to preserve privacy and reduce UV and glare
  • Fritted glass - ceramic dot pattern at edges hides visibility of cut metal
  • Compatible with Ford Custom vans from 2015 onwards
Product Availability: Fast delivery options available!

Product Name: Campervan Glass Window for Fiat Ducato / Citroen Relay / Peugeot Boxer - Front Driver Side UK
Product Description:
Campervan Bonded Privacy Glass with Window Ducato, Boxer, Relay H2, L2/L3/L4 2006 onwards

Front right hand window for Ducato, Relay and Boxer campervans

Manufactured to OEM standard, this bonded van window is suitable for the right hand variants of the Fiat Ducato, Relay and Boxer camper vans. Our tempered windows are 'E' stamped, which means they meet the strict European safety standard UN/ECE R43, ensuring this glass is safe for use on vehicles.

Ideal for van conversions

Whether you are converting a Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer or Citroen Relay into a campervan, or simply require more light in the relay van you work in, these Fiat Ducato bonded windows are a neat, tidy and practical solution. These windows match the specifications of windows fitted in the factory by manufacturers, ensuring you are receiving a fully compatible and high quality window.

Strength and privacy as standard

As with all our bonded windows, this bonded window for the Ducato models is tempered and features a permanent 80% tint which not only looks sleek, but also helps to reduce glare and UV in the van, as well as offering privacy to the user. As these windows are tempered, they will shatter into small pieces instead of sharp shards when broken, reducing the chance of injury in the event of an accident substantially.

Campervan bonded window features:

  • Tempered glass ensures no sharp shards if broken
  • 80% privacy tinted
  • 'E' stamped to ensure compliance with strict European safety regulations on vehicle windows
  • Fritted glass - ceramic dot pattern at edges hides visibility of cut metal

Compatible with:

  • Fiat Ducato L2/L3/L4 2007 on - Front Right Hand
  • Citroen Relay L2/L3/L4 2007 on - Front Right Hand
  • Peugeot Boxer  L2/L3/L4 2007 on - Front Right Hand

Not suitable for SWB (L1) vehicles. Picture is to illustrate install side only.
Product Availability: In stock Fiat Ducato bonded windows are ususally sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Glass Sliding Window Fiat Ducato / Citroen Relay / Peugeot Boxer Front Driver UK
Product Description:
Campervan Bonded Privacy Glass with Sliding Window Ducato, Boxer, Relay L2/L3/L4 2006 onwards

Front right hand window for Ducato, Relay and Boxer campervans

Manufactured to OEM standard, this bonded van window is suitable for the right hand variants of the Fiat Ducato, Relay and Boxer camper vans. Our tempered windows are 'E' stamped, which means they meet the strict European safety standard UN/ECE R43, ensuring this glass is safe for use on vehicles.

Ideal for van conversions

Whether you are converting a Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer or Citroen Relay into a campervan, or simply require more light in the relay van you work in, these Fiat Ducato bonded windows are a neat, tidy and practical solution. These windows match the specifications of windows fitted in the factory by manufacturers, ensuring you are receiving a fully compatible and high quality window.

Strength and privacy as standard

As with all our bonded windows, this bonded window for the Ducato models is tempered and features a permanent 80% tint which not only looks sleek, but also helps to reduce glare and UV in the van, as well as offering privacy to the user. As these windows are tempered, they will shatter into small pieces instead of sharp shards when broken, reducing the chance of injury in the event of an accident substantially.

Campervan bonded window features:

  • Tempered glass ensures no sharp shards if broken
  • 80% privacy tinted
  • 'E' stamped to ensure compliance with strict European safety regulations on vehicle windows
  • Fritted glass - ceramic dot pattern at edges hides visibility of cut metal

Compatible with:

  • Fiat Ducato L2/L3/L4 2006 - Front Right Hand
  • Citroen Relay L2/L3/L4 2006 - Front Right Hand
  • Peugeot Boxer L2/L3/L4 2006 - Front Right Hand

Not suitable for SWB vehicles.

Product Name: Dometic Micro Heki Campervan Caravan Rooflight
Product Description:
Dometic Micro Heki Campervan Caravan Rooflight

The Dometic 280 x 280mm Heki rooflight to compliment the immensely popular Heki S and Heki Style ranges in 400 x 400mm.

Ultra compact solution

Ideal for allowing more light into your Campervan, Motorhome or Caravan Bathroom, whilst maintaining privacy, the Dometic Micro Heki Rooflight is the smallest of the Heki range, and comes complete with flyscreen and optional blind built in.

Balance Shade and Light

Using the blind, you can play with just the right amount of light or shade as you wish, and all whilst keeping insects out of the campervan or motorhome using the integral flyscreen. The Dometic Micro Heki has a double glazed roof dome which is tinted on the outside and opens in two steps to a maximum angle of 50°. A special locking device keeps the opened window firmly in position.

With or Without Fixed Ventilation?

  • Fixed Ventilation: Allows some air in even when closed, ideal for caravans that need constant airflow to prevent condensation buildup. May cause whistling noise while traveling.
  • Without Fixed Ventilation: Creates a complete seal when closed, better for campervans and motorhomes where ventilation during travel is less important and noise reduction is desired.

 

Features

  • Inner frame with fly screen (can be adjusted separately) and optional darkening blind
  • This model comes forced ventilation or without forced ventilation
  • Maximum opening angle: 50°
  • Double acrylic glazing, tinted on the outside
  • Lockable vent position

Dimensions

  • Dimensions product depth 370mm
  • Dimensions product height 370mm
  • Dimensions product width 408mm
  • Cut out height 280mm
  • Cut out width 280mm
  • Possible material thickness 1 min 23 mm
  • Possible material thickness 1 max 42 mm
  • Net weight 1.60 kg

Product Name: Fiamma VAN 260 Privacy Room Light For F45 Awnings
Product Description:
Fiamma VAN 260 Privacy Room Light For F45 Awnings

A complete set of side and front panels, complete with framework, to make a privacy for Fiamma F45 minivan awning canopies. The Fiamma F45 VAN 260 Privacy Room Light is made from lighter weight material than the standard Fiamma Privacy Room and are supplied without the rear vertical rafter to reduce the weight you are carrying in your motorhome or campervan.

Compatibility

Suitable for summer or mid-season use, the Fiamma VAN 260 Privacy Room Light can be secured to Fiamma F45 and F70 awnings that are 260cm in length. The enclosure has an installation height of 180-220cm.

Privacy Room Features

The Fiamma F45 Privacy Room Light side panels include large flyscreens and roll-up blinds for adequate ventilation and privacy. The sides attach to the awning canopy via the Fast Clip for quick and effortless installation every time.

Front Panel Attachment

Install the front panel by sliding in to the channel on the awning fascia, and the component panels are interchangeable so you can have the door and windows on either side. The front panel has a roll up full light window with fitted flyscreen and curtains as standard. Perfect to ensure your campervan awning area is properly ventilated yet reduce the number of bugs inside. The privacy room is constructed from a lightweight and durable grey polyester and crystal windows provide a light and airy extra living space alongside campervan. 

Any returns that you have ordered incorrectly are subject to a restocking charge. For advice please call before ordering 0151 334 0222

Fiamma VAN 260 Privacy Room Light Specifications

  • Vehicle Compatibility: Minivan/Campervan
  • Awning Compatibility Dimensions:
    • Length 260cm
    • Height from Ground: 180-220cm
    • Extension: 200cm
  • Weight: 12kg
  • Privacy Room Includes:
    • 1 x Front panel with opening window and mosquito net
    • 2 x Side panels with roll-up blind and mosquito nets
    • 1 x Fast Clip Light installation kit (2 aluminium poles)
    • 1 x Curtain kit for the window of the front panel
    • 1 x Kit pegs for safe fixing to the ground
    • 1 x Kit elastic ropes with quick
    • 1 x Mega Bag Light (Carry Bag 140 x 25 x 25cm)

Product Name: Winbond Ultra Cure - Campervan Window Installation Kit
Product Description:
Winbond Ultra Cure - Campervan Window Installation Kit

Complete installation kit for bonded campervan windows

Featuring a specialised adhesive for installing windows to vehicles, this window installation kit contains all that you need to securely fix glass windows to your campervan. Ultra Cure is a rapid curing formula, providing easy installation. 

Includes primer, applicators and more

This kit includes as standard a wipe to clean the surface, specialised primer to prepare the surface for the adhesive, applicators to ease installation, a cartridge of adhesive, a nozzle, instructions and gloves. The Winbond Glass Wipe 'activates' the glass surface, whilst also cleaning and degreasing the surface. The Winbond Glass Primer forms a barrier against UV light, since UV can degrade PU adhesive rapidly. Detailed usage, safety and installation instructions are supplied with each kit.

Usage tips

We recommend you store your adhesive indoors for a couple of days to ensure it is at room temperature - this eases application. It's best to wait a minimum of 2-4 hours before using your vehicle when installing windows. Follow the instructions carefully for the best results.

Winbond Ultra Cure Kit - Contents:

  • 1x Winbond Ultra Cure adhesive - 310ml
  • 1x Winbond Black Glass/Paint Surface - 30ml
  • 1x Winbond Glass Wipe activator/cleaner
  • 1x Soft tip applicator
  • 1x Pair of gloves
  • 1x Nozzle
  • 1x Instructions

Product Description:
Vango Versos Drive Away Inflatable Awning

Unique Multi-Configuration Driveaway Awning

The Vango Versos Drive Away awning offers unparalleled flexibility with an adaptable layout deisgn, perfect for campervan or motorhomes. Once you arrive at your location, you can decide how you want the awning orientated and connect the annex and bedroom areas to the awning. So if your campervan or motorhome is facing a stunning mountain vista or breath-taking sea view, simply pitch the awning in the preferred direction before attaching the annex and bedroom in the position you want for optimum choice. 

Easy To Pitch Inflatable Awning

The pre-angled AirBeam frame provides a strong, spacious awning that is easily and quickly inflated via a single inflation point for a speedy and simple pitch each time. The supplied AirBeam pump incorporates a gauge for accurate and effortless inflation in next to no time. With a choice of two tunnel connection heights, the Vango Versos awning fits a wide range of suitable campervans or motorhomes with connection rail heights between 180 to 255cm.

Multi Vehicle Attachment

The Versos Drive Away Awning comes with an array of tunnel connection methods for added flexibility. With a pre-attached 6mm kador connection, extra long over roof straps, pole and clamp compatible sleeve and roof bar attachment tabs, simply choose the preferred connection type for your motorhome or campervan.

Vango Versos Air Key Features

  • Lightweight and durable 150D fabric
  • Waterproof rating of 4,000mm Hydrostatic Head
  • AirBeam structure with pre-angled shaped beams for improved internal space
  • Multi layout design for bedroom and annex positioning
  • Twin doors on connecting tunnel for convenient access
  • Sewn-in groundsheet
  • Easy Access Doors for improved accessibility
  • Diamond Clear Windows for maximum natural light
  • Adjustable pegging points
  • Hi-visibility guylines for improved safety

Vango Versos Air Low Specifications

  • Kador Height: 180-210cm
  • Kador Length: 240cm   

Vango Versos Air Mid Specifications

  • Kador Height: 215-255cm
  • Kador Length: 240cm

Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 1200 Awning for Caravan

Rail Mounted Lightweight Caravan Canopy

The Thule Omnistor 1200 awning is compact and lightweight, perfect for caravans with an existing rail. No drilling necessary. Super easy setup, simply feed into your caravan's existing rail to quickly get up and running. Featuring the choice of two canopy colours including Mystic Grey or Sapphire Blue, these premium caravan awnings are available in sizes ranging from 2.30m to 5.50m in length with a canopy projection from 2.00m to 2.50m.

Best Caravan Awning Around

The best easy fit caravan awning on the market! With an easy installation and high-quality construction, this awning ensures durability and long lasting years of use. Featuring an exclusive fabric tensioning system with pump-buckle technology to make sure there is perfect fabric tension every time you set up! Avoid puddles building up in your canopy and ensure you stay protected year round!

Fits into a small bag for easy packing and secure storage on the side of your caravan. Set-up cannot be easier with simultaneous release of the support and tension that legs swing out horizontally to prevent damage to your vehicle. Just roll by hand out of the bag and set up the support legs, super easy installation! Crafted from high quality waterproof and colour fast PVC-coated fabric for protection against all weather including sun and rain.

1200 Caravan Awning Key Features:

  • Suitable for caravans with pre-existing rail, no drilling needed
  • Easy installation - simply slide the awning on to your caravan when its needed
  • Recommended 2 person installation
  • Integrated fabric tensioning system with pump buckle for perfect fabric tension
  • Fast, easy setup with simultaneous swing-out of the support and tension legs
  • Tent extension ready, integrated fitting for an easy fixation of an awning tent
  • Durable, high-quality material for ensured lasting use
  • Weatherproof PVC coated fabric for complete protection against harsh rain and sun
  • Rolled open and closed manually
  • Selection of canopy colours available including Mystic Grey and Sapphire Blue
  • Range of sizes available from 2.30m to 5.50m in length and 2.00 to 2.50m in canopy width

Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 5200 Awning for Motorhome and Campervan

The Thule Omnistor  5200 awning is a premium wall-mounted awning designed for campervans and motorhomes. Available in three stylish cassette colours including White, Anodised and Anthracite, with a canopy projection ranging from 1.4m to 2.5m to suit your needs. Each awnings comes with the Mystic Grey awning fabric providing both style and shade to your van.

Premium Wall-Mounted Awning

Superior protection from sun, wind and rain, the premium Thule 5200 awning provides shelter against the elements to keep you dry whilst enjoying the outdoors. Designed for super easy operation, open and close your awning using the included hand crank, or if a zero effort solution is preferred, upgrade your awning with the Thule Omnistor 5200 Motor Kit for a completely hands free option.

Featuring quick-release support legs that drop vertically from the awning to avoid damaging your vehicle. The roll-out canopy fabric and welded joints provide maximum waterproofing providing you with a long lasting reliable awning. Crafted from lightweight fabric that helps the awning retain tension and reduces puddle build-up on the roof, this wall mounted awning provides excellent shelter no matter the weather.

Easy Installation

A flat adapter is supplied as standard making the Omnistor 5200 a perfect fit for wall-mounting onto your motorhomes and campervans. With a user friendly setup, the Omnistor allows you to adjust the height of the support legs, and the incline of the awning to suit your needs.

Thule Awning Features:

  • Side wall mounting
  • Sturdy spring arms ensure perfectly tensioned awning fabric, avoids puddle build-up
  • Projection up to 2.50m to increase your outdoor space and protection from sun and rain
  • Vertically lowering system to unfold support legs without danger
  • User-friendly Quick-Lock system for easy adjustments
  • Built-in drainage system to dispose of water and make cleaning easy
  • Three cassette colours including White, Anodised and Anthracite
  • Mystic Grey awning fabric colour

Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 6300 Awning for Campervan and Motorhome

The Thule Omnistor 630 is a premium roof mounted awning designed for campervans and motorhomes. Available from sizes 2.60m to 4.50m in length with up to 2.5m of protection from the sun and rain. Featuring a mystic grey canopy colour and the choice of three cassette colours, white, anodised and anthracite to suit your needs and match your campervan perfectly.

Roof-Mounted Quality Awning Design

The best roof mounted awning for retrofitting onto your van. Superseding the Thule 6200 Omnistor, the updated design of the 6300 awning is more lightweight and aerodynamic than its predecessor, featuring an anti-rattling design that gives it a sleek look on your camper. The roof mounted installation allows for adjustment of the canopy angle. Allowing you to open and close the awning even when the sliding door of your van is open. Keeping your rail free for other uses.

Featuring an integrated drainage system that keep the rain from building up and making your awning super easy to clean. The perfect user-friendly campervan awning for your next adventure! Sheltering from rain and sun, this canopy allows you to relax in the outdoors whatever the weather. Due to the flexibility of the awning, the Omnistor fits most motorhomes and campervans on the market. Built-in Quick Lock system for easy setting and adjustment of support legs for easy setup. We recommend putting one leg slightly lower on one side so that water can drain easily.

Thule Omnistor 6300 Features:

  • Durable and stable roof mounted awning
  • Maximum flexibility
  • Integrated drain to prevent & dispose of water build up
  • Easy opening and closing with manual hand crank
  • Thule Quick-Lock System
  • Range of cassette colour finishes available
  • Mystic grey canopy fabric

Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 4200 Awning for Motorhome and Campervan

The Thule Omnistor awning range is regarded as the best wall-mounted awnings for motorhomes. The Thule Omnistor 4200 is suitable for campervans and motorhomes. Available in a range of lengths from 2.6m to 4.5m the Thule Omnistor 4200 awning has a maximum projection of 2.5m with cassettes also available in white, anodised grey and anthracite black. The Thule Omnistor 4200 comes with a Mystic Grey awning colour.

Best Wall Mounted Awning

Superseding the 4900 model, the Omnistor 4200 awning features a new end cap design that ensures a sleek, integrated look on your camper. Opening and closing the awning cannot be easier thanks to the useful telescopic hand crank. Featuring sealing rubber that uses an integrated drainage system to drain water off of the awning. Ensuring no water build-up and keeps you protected in rainy weather.

A huge weight reduction has been applied thanks to a small roller tube support which keeps the awning stable. One of the lightest awnings in the market with the 2.6m x 2.00m model weighing just at 17kg. The risk of damage to your vehicle has also been reduced with the oval support legs being dropped vertically. Perfect opening and closing is possible for many years of use due to an easy roller tube adjustment system. As standard, awnings from 4m or more in length have a Thule Tension Rafter G2 supplied, for maximum comfort.

Easy Installation

As standard, a flat adapter is supplied, making the Omnistor 4200 awning perfect for a wall mounted fitting onto your motorhome or campervan. The Thule 4200 also allows you to adjust the height of the support legs, and the incline of the awning to suit your needs, making setup super user friendly.

Thule 4200 Awning Key Features:

  • New sleek design
  • Side wall mounting
  • Thule QuickFit & EasyLink combability
  • Canopy Projection up to 2.50m
  • Flat adapter supplied as standard
  • Pre-installed Tension Rafter pieces for maximum comfort
  • Anti-rattling technology
  • Telescopic hand crank open/close mechanism
  • Seamless sealing application method 
  • Easy roller tube adjustment

Criss Cross Premium Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover
Product Description:
Criss Cross Premium Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover

The Criss Cross Premium swimming pool winter debris cover is made in the UK from finest grade woven polyethylene with a green finish and webbing straps stitched across the full length and width of the cover for extra strength. This durable winter debris cover will help to reduce frost damage to the swimming pool and will keep the pool clean and debris free during the close down period.

Saving money on Spring time cleaning the bills the Criss Cross Premium Swimming Pool Winter Debris Cover can also dramatically reduce the staining from leaves by preventing debris entry into the pool but allowing water to pass through.

Criss Cross Winter Debris Cover Features:-

  • High quality woven polyethylene fabrics
  • Webbing straps stitched across full length and width of cover for extra strength
  • 5 year guarantee
  • Supplied with polished stainless steel fittings
  • Made in UK
  • Available in Blue, Green, Grey and Tan

It is recommended that the cover overlaps the perimeter of the pool by 1 foot (300mm)
Product Availability: Please call for pricing of the Criss Cross premium winter debris covers.
