Product Name: Tasman 4500 2 Burner Hotplate Boat and Caravan Hob and Grill
Product Description:
Tasman 4500 2 Burner Hotplate Boat, Campervan and Caravan Hob and Grill

The Tasman 4500 2 burner hob and grill, is an ideal cooking solution for your campervan, caravan, motorhome or boat.

Simplicity and style

With it's ultra modern brushed stainless steel looks, and safety features like the flame failure device, the Tasman 400 looks as good as it cooks and fits inside a compact space of just 450mm width, ideal when space is at a premium in your caravan, boat or campervan (Full measurements in specifications). The optional gimbal kit, as shown in the last photo, helps keeps your cooking secure, which is especially useful in marine scenarios.

Please note - the grill pan handle is now on the short edge of the grill tray. Pictures will be updated shortly.

Features

  • Made in Great Britain
  • All burners protected with Flame Failure Devices (FFD)
  • Compact but Versatile
  • Available with Electric Spark Ignition on all burners (Requires 1 x AA Battery)
  • 1 x Large RAPIDE Hotplate Burner
  • 1 x Standard Semi RAPIDE Burner
  • Suitable for use with Propane or Butane
  • Cooker width - 450mm
  • Cooker depth - 420mm
  • Cooker Height incl. pan supports - 190mm

The Tasman 4500 is Made in Great Britain!

Thule Residence G3 Caravan, Campervan and Motorhome Awning Privacy Room for 6300
Product Description:
Thule Residence G3 Awning for Thule Omnistor 6300

Privacy Room for Omnistor 6300

The Thule Residence G3 is a perfect addition to your Thule Omnistor 6300 awning - turning your canopy awning into a high quality usable privacy room couldn't be easier with the Residence G3 turning any Omnistor canopy into a light and spacious living space.

Due to Thule's thoughtful design the Residence G3 is versatile and easy to mount. With front and side panels sliding into the rail of your Thule Omnistor awning and combined with a zip to create the perfect seal to your awning, the side panel clamp into place ensuring an excellent roof seal. Further size and part information for the Thule Residence G3 Awning is available within the below user manual.

Residence G3 Features:

  • Perfect roof sealing due to clamping
  • High stability due to diagonal support between mast profile and clamping profile
  • Seal off space between vehicle wall and the side using adjustable mast profile
  • Large windows let in light
  • Front panel has integrated doors on each end
  • Perfect air circulation due to aeration on both sides. Two side windows also have mosquito mesh
  • Side and front can be rolled upwards for easy entrance
  • Add accessories in the optional rail at the front of the tent
  • Made of high quality PVC fabric
  • Wind slip included to seal off the bottom of your vehicle

Thule Omnistor Residence G3 Dimensions:

Product Name: Adventurer 700mm x 500mm Skylight Roof Vent Black Trim for Campervan with LED Lights
Product Description:
Adventurer Skylight Roof Vent for Campervan Caravan and Motorhome - Black Trim

700mm X 500mm Rooflight with LED

The Adventurer 700 x 500mm Skylight Roof Vent is ideal for your campervan, caravan or motorhome. With key features including a built-in LED light and fixed ventilation, this rooflight is perfect for your next outdoor leisure adventure. The Adventurer 700mm x 500mm Campervan Sky Vent is built with up to 150 cubic centimetres of permanent ventilation to reduce condensation.

Designed to improve the airflow and ventilation in your caravan or motorhome, this stylish rooflight comes with a robust black trim and a double glazed dome top. This Adventurer Skylight comes fitted with a gas lift spring to make opening and closing this campervan roof light easy and simple. The rooflight can open at a maximum angle of 60° with three locking positions. Also featuring a blackout blind to adjust the level of sunlight and a flyscreen to protect from bugs. Its double glazed dome top provides excellent thermal insulation to keep your caravan cool in summer and warm in the winter. 

Skylight Roof Vent Key Features

  • Stylish black trim around the edges
  • Built-in LED light and switch
  • Adjustable ventilation
  • Double glazed dome top
  • Interior frame with blackout blind and flyscreen
  • Easy operation open/close with gas lift spring
  • Permanent ventilation

Please Note This Roof Light Has Fixed Ventilation:

Provides continuous airflow even when closed, ideal for caravans preventing condensation build-up. This may lead to wind noise and whistling when travelling in campervans or motorhomes.
Product Availability: Sent on a next working day carrier!!

Product Description:
Thule Panorama Privacy Room Awning

This long stay awning tent, available in a variety of lengths and projections which includes a number of features designed to ensure this awning is easy to install, stable and robust.

Thule's Awning Design

The Panorama's installation couldn't be any easier as the side panels of the awning simply slides into place within the clamping profiles and he front panel slides perfectly into the awning lead rail, the zipper connection on the front and rear panels ensures ideal closing.

Thule Panorama Awning Features

  • High stability
  • Large windows
  • Watertight Airtex polyester fabric
  • Clean appearance due to panels hiding support legs
  • Perfect air circulation via aeration on both sides
  • Each panel has an integrated left and right door
  • Two luxury carry bags made from high quality polyester

Any returns that you have ordered incorrectly are subject to a restocking charge. For advice please call before ordering 0151 334 0222

Product Name: Avtex M219DRS PRO 12v LED TV Freeview HD DVD SAT HD REC Caravan Motorhome TV
Product Description:
Avtex M219DRS PRO 12v LED TV Freeview HD SAT HD DVD REC Caravan Motorhome TV

Featuring an incredibly stylish, compact design, the Avtex M219DRS PRO 12v LED TV is a high quality television for your motorhome or caravan packed full of the latest technology.

The Avtex M219DRS PRO has full HD (not just HD ready) alongside the very latest DVB-T2 and DVB-S2 digital technology providing additional HD channels through your regular aerial and your satellite dish.

Designed for ease of use and versatile viewing options at the highest quality, the Avtex M219DRS PRO 12v LED TV is full of convenient features such as the simple to use Avtex AQT tuning system or the ability to record or pause live TV to an external memory device (e.g. USB or HDD), so you never have to miss a beat of your favourite show!

Avtex M219DRS PRO 12v LED TV Features:

  • 21" FULL HD widescreen [1080p]
  • Dimensions: W492mm x H289mm x D46mm without stand (Stand adds 19mm to height)
  • Weight Inc Stand 3.1Kg
  • DVBT & DVBT2 digital tuner
  • DVB-S & DVB-S2 digital satellite tuner
  • HD built-in in for terrestrial and satellite channels
  • Pause and record LIVE TV (USB drive Required not supplied)
  • DVD/CD player
  • Recording (USB drive Required not supplied)
  • AQT one button tuning system
  • Pause/playback live TV/Instant record to USB on both Satellite and TV
  • Timer record from programme guide (EPG)
  • 2xHDMI/2xUSB/phono/headphone/audio in/co-axial audio-out
  • CI socket for access for pay TV’s
  • Wall mountable VESA standard
  • 240v AC / 12v24v DC
  • Twin USB Ports
  • Digital text/fastext
  • Low battery indicator
  • Easyfind compatible
  • Avtex the only EasyFind compatible TV's’

Product Name: Avtex M199DRS PRO 12v HD TV DVD Caravan Motorhome Television
Product Description:
Avtex M199DRS PRO 19.5" TV DVD Combination

Providing precise clarity and depth of field, the Avtex M199DRS PRO 19.5" 12v/24v TV is the ultimate All-In-One Avtex television which also boasts an abundance of terrific features to enhance the TV viewing experience in your caravan, motorhome or campervan.

Amongst it's many benefits, this ultra slim 19.5" Portable Widescreen TV has the ability to pause, playback and record live Satellite and Terrestial (freeview) TV (to an external USB device, not included), an AQT one button tuning system (so you won't have to waste time and patience having to manually tune every channel yourself!), built in digital technology (DVB-T2 and DVB-S2) to enable you to receive additional HD channels through a regular aerial or satellite dish, as well as a DVD / CD player and a useful low battery indicator.

The Avtex M199DRS PRO 19.5" TV for caravans and motorhomes is specifically designed for mobile leisure use and operates on 12v/24v or mains. The Avtex M199DRS PRO features an intelligent design that not only looks great and fits neatly into the majority of vehicles, but also does everything you'd want from the Avtex M199DRS PRO TV.

What's in the box?

  • Avtex M199DRS PRO TV/DVD
  • 12V/24V cigarette lighter cable
  • 240V mains power cable
  • Remote control

Avtex M199DRS PRO Features:

  • 19.5” FULL HD widescreen [1080p]
  • Dimensions: W449mm x H259mm x D46mm Without stand (Stand adds 19mm to Height)
  • Weight Including Stand 2.7Kg
  • DVBT & DVBT2 digital tuner
  • DVB-S & DVB-S2 digital satellite tuner
  • HD built-in in for terrestrial and satellite channels
  • DVD/CD player
  • AQT one button tuning system
  • Pause/playback live TV/Instant record to USB on both Satellite and TV
  • Timer record from programme guide (EPG)
  • 2xHDMI/2xUSB/phono/headphone/audio in/co-axial audio-out
  • CI socket for access for pay TV’s
  • Wall mountable VESA standard
  • 240v AC / 12v24v DC
  • USB Ports
  • Digital text/fastext
  • Record one program whilst watching another (Requires USB Drive not supplied)
  • Low battery indicator
  • New M199DRS PRO replaces the previous model, the L199DRS PRO
  • Easyfind® compatible

Product Name: Remis Campervan Window Cab Blinds for VW Crafter & MAN TGE 2019 -2024
Product Description:
Remis Campervan Window Cab blinds for VW Crafter & MAN TGE 2019-2024

This Remis Remifront blind system is to fit the Volkswagen Crafter and MAN vans from 2019 onwards. These Remis blinds are without doubt the most effective cab window black out system available. The tough rigid frames are designed to complement the original manufactures door trim and once they are fixed in place, they look like a factory fitted blinds system.

The pleated blinds give complete black out, so you can sleep in the daytime and keep your privacy at night, also the Remis cab blinds are solar reflective to reduce the build-up of heat within your van. They also retract neatly away to provide the safety of un-obscured vision whilst driving.

The Remis VW Crafter & MAN blinds work with the vans that have the upper storage compartment, if you van does not have this then these will not fit.

Complete set including Left hand side door blind – Right hand side door blind and front windscreen blind.

Please Note: We are unable to ship Remis blinds to Northern Ireland

Please Note: Front Blind has been updated and now opens and closes from the sides
Product Availability: In stock & sent on a next working day delivery.

Product Name: Remis Motorhome Campervan Window Cab Blinds for Ducato Boxer Relay Jumper
Product Description:
Remis Remifront Campervan Motorhome Window Cab Blinds

For Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, Citroen Relay & Jumper

The Remis Remifront cab blinds are designed especially for the Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, Citroen Relay, and Citroen Jumper motorhomes and campervans,

Manufactured especially for your van

Designed to look factory-fitted, Remis Remifront cab blinds are available in grey for X250 models from 2006-2011 and beige from 2011-2014 as well as beige for the newer X290 model manufactured from 2014 onwards with variations suitable to fit vehicles with or without a built in rain sensor.

Additional privacy and temperature control

The cab blinds enhance privacy and comfort whilst helping to retain warmth in the winter and reflect heat in the summer.

Suitable for Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer, and Citroen Relay & Jumper models from 2006

Below is a list of the Remis Remifront cab blinds available. Please ensure you select the appropriate cab blinds for your model when ordering.

Please Note: We are unable to ship Remis blinds to Northern Ireland

Please note: Whilst the change in 2011 affecting X250 models was a colour change to match the interior (from grey to beige), the change in 2014 to the X290 facelift models resulted in minor physical changes.

Additionally, a limited number of pre-2006 models were registered as late as 2007, and cab blinds for pre-2006 models are no longer manufactured. Please ensure you order the correct blinds suitable for your van.

From 2020 there was a new variant of the X290 launched with a larger rain sensor. This appears to measure approx. 230mm in width. Please note some vehicles from 2019 may have been fitted with the larger rain sensor. Please check before ordering, any questions please contact us. 

 Installation Guide

Legacy Installation Guide

Product Description:
Dometic Sinepower DSP 212 Inverter

Ensuring a reliable operation of devices up to 150W with a vehicle battery the Sinepower DSP 212 inverter transforms 12V battery voltage into a 230V alternating current. The design of the inverter prevents damage from overload, overheating, overvoltage and undervoltage along with being equipped with a quiet fan coupled with load and tempeture control.

Product Name: Vitrifrigo CP25SIAL Compact Campervan 12 volt Fridge
Product Description:
Vitrifrigo CP25SIAL Compact Campervan Fridge

The Vitrifrigo CP25SIAL

Is an ideal fridge for your campervan or van conversion, where space is at a premium, particularly depth and height.

The CP25 SIAL is perfect for Campervans and conversions built on campervan designs such as the Nissan Bongo, Toyota Granvia, VW T5, Westfalia or Classic VWs due to its shallow depth.

Stylish but compact

With an overall depth of just 322mm (Including the door) and a removeable silver panel as standard, the CP25SIAL can be modified easily to match decor, or the surrounding units (See in pictures)

Technical Specifications

  • Voltage 12/24V
  • Demountable Micro Compressor
  • Weight (Kg) 13
  • Danfoss/Secop BD Micro Compressor

Key Features

  • Unique Airlock catch - positive lock with vent position
  • Internal LED light as standard
  • Super light weight at 13kg
  • Greater efficiency and lower noise through Secop BD Micro compressor and aluminium finned cooling unit
  • Door can be hinged left or right and grey front panel is removable, allowing you to match the fridge with your cabinets (See pictures)
  • Highly efficient at an estimated consumption of 0.3A/h (UK summertime)

Dimensions

  • 442mm H x 425mm W x  322mm D(Including door)

 

Please note: Due to the design of a fridge with a removable compressor, extra care must be taken when moving the fridge and demount-able compressor unit itself

Product Name: Astral Swimming Pool Dynamic Diving Board
Product Description:
Astral Swimming Pool Dynamic Diving Board

The Astral Dynamic Diving Board is a high quality flexible springboard for your swimming pool. The Dynamic Diving Board features a gel coated surface which remains flexible after adverse weather conditions and UV exposure.

For swimming pool safety the entire Astral Dynamic Diving Board is covered with a non-slip surface and features additional water repellent non-slip strips over the spring area.

The Astral Dynamic Diving Board is supplied with anchor and fittings.

In the interests of safety for installation of the swimming pool dynamic diving board the recommended SPATA guidelines and standards should be adhered to.

The 'Cage of Safety' is an area of water of sufficient size and depth within the deep end of the pool of various dimensions that allows normal deck level diving with safety. Irrespective of the shape or profile of the pool this 'Cage of Safety' should be maintained. Please see SPATA standards for more information.
Product Availability: #Special Order 6 to 8 weeks

Product Name: Reimo Tour Easy Young 2 Campervan Awning - Fits VW T5 T6 & More
Product Description:
Reimo Tour Easy Young 2 Campervan Drive Away Awning

Simple and compact camper drive away awning

The New REIMO Tour Easy Young 2 is the ultimate value drive away awning. This refined tunnel design is based on Reimo's popular Easy awning model, with an evolved design featuring many quality of life improvements. 

Designed for life

The large main door is complimented by a zippable windowed door on the right, providing excellent ventilation and access for summer days. Both large side windows to ensure your awning is well lit and have half mosquito mesh and half transparent PVC for added convenience. In addition to these features, the awning comes in a compact package, making it easy to pack, and easy to pitch.

Perfect for campervans

While this drive away awning is a great fit for VW T5 and T6 campervans, it's compatible with much more. This awning comes equipped with both 5mm and 8mm kador strip mounting, tensioning lines and a D Shaped Airlock Door to the camper van or van conversion vehicle.

What's in the box?

  • 1 x Awning base fabric & guy lines
  • Tent pegs
  • Lightweight poles
  • Awning bag

Specifications

  • Material 185T Polyester, flame retardant.
  • Hydrostatic Head rating (HH): 3000mm
  • Dimensions: W 320 x D 250 (+45cm for Airlock) x H (Entrance) 210 cm.
  • Mounting Height: 180-220cm
  • Kador Size: 5/8mm diameter

Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 9200 Roof Mounted Awning

The Omnistor 9200 is the perfect roof-mounted awning for extra-large vehicles with projections of 3 metres. Designed to fit any vehicle design coupled with anti-rattling device for a smoother ride.

Thule have included integrated vehicle design for the Omnistor 9200 range which improves the finish of the canopy while also hiding all technical parts. The awning fabric is perfectly tensioned every time due to the sturdy spring arms, this also helps with safer usage in the event of strong winds. You can also adjust the support legs to a variant of heights thanks to the Quick-Lock system.

Technical Specifications:

  • User-friendly Quick-Lock system for adjustments
  • Length from 4.00m to 6.00m
  • Sturdy spring arms
  • Patented tension arms

Thule Omnistor 8000 Wall-Mounted Awning

The Thule Omnistor 800 is the largest wall-mounted awning on the market, available in 5 lengths from 4m to 6m coupled with a maximum projection of 2.75m, with three types of cassette finishes.

Design Features

The Omnistor 8000 features integrated tension rafter within the spring arm which ensures the fabric is always well tensioned. Built in drainage system allows for easy cleaning once or twice a year. Adjust with ease thanks to the Quick-Lock system which allows you to adjust the support legs to the optimal height you wish.

Omnistor 8000 Technical Specifications

  • Front panel drainage system
  • Vertically lowering system
  • User friendly Quick-Lock system
  • Easy Cleaning

Product Name: Bowman Hot Tub and Spa Pool Heat Exchanger
Product Description:
Bowman Hot Tub Spa Heat Exchanger

The Bowman Heat Exchanger is a cost effective and energy efficient way to heat your Spa, Hot Tub or swimming pool. Available in 3 models with tube stacks constructed from Cupro Nickel (1C), Stainless Steel (1S) or Titanium (1T). The Titanium tube stack offers durability and is highly resistant to chemical attack in the Spa or Hot Tub carrying a 10 year guarantee.

Energy Saving

Traditionally most Spa and Hot Tub are heated using 3kW electric heaters which are slow and expensive to run. By using a Bowman Heat Exchanger in conjunction with a gas or biomass boiler heat up times and energy usage are reduced. As electricity is approximately twice as expensive per kWh for heating the savings can be considerable.

Environmental Benefit

According to the Energy Saving Trust gas produces less than half the carbon dioxide per kilowatt that electricity produces.

Compact and Easy to Install

The compact Bowman EC80 Spa Hot Tub Heat Exchanger is just 368mm long enabling easy installation with the supplied solvent weld connectors in imperial and metric sizes. Bowman heat exchangers are supplied with removable composite ends and tubestacks for easy maintenance.

An integral 7mm thermostat pocket is built in to the Bowman EC80 Hot Tub Spa Pool Heat Exchanger.

Please note that as for all metal fittings within a pool or hot tub system the water chemistry must be balanced (especially pH) to avoid chemical damage.

If you have a salt chlorination system in the pool you need to use a Titanium heat exchanger.

Product Name: Maxxair MaxxFan Deluxe Remote Control Campervan Caravan Motorhome Roof Vent With Fan
Product Description:
Maxxair MaxxFan Deluxe Remote Control Campervan Caravan Motorhome Roof Vent With Fan

The Maxxair MaxxFan Deluxe

Is an ideal solution, popular with the American RV market, for moving air, in and out of the Campervan or Caravan, quickly, and quietly.

Overview

The MaxxFan Deluxe Campervan Caravan Motorhome Roof Vent is a unique ventilation system that protects your Campervan interior at all times, and in all weathers. The MaxxFan brings in fresh air and removes stale air along with unwanted smells. A handy switch on the remote allows you to reverse the flow of air in and out of your vehicle. The MaxxFan opens and closes automatically with the handy remote or, just as a standard campervan roof vent utilising the manual knob built onto MaxxFan frame.

Easy to clean, quiet and powerful

The MaxxFan features an easily removable interior insect screen, simply unscrew the retaining knobs to remove screen for cleaning, no tools required. The MaxxFan features a powerful, fuse protected, sealed ball bearing 12 volt fan motor with 12" 10 bladed fan for quiet operation in your Campervan, Caravan or Motorhome.

Features

  • The ability to move over 900 cu.ft. of air per minute.
  • Remote Keypad controls fan speed, thermostat, and air intake and exhaust functions.
  • The locking knob ensures the vent lid stays fully open or closed.
  • The MaxxFan can run with lid closed (ceiling fan mode)
  • Can be used while campervan is on the move
  • All mounting screws and hardware included.
  • Option to manually open and close the vent lid by simply rotating the knob at the fan.
  • Control the Maxxfan at the ceiling unit or by remote.

Specifications

  • Powerful 10 speed motor
  • Available in CLEAR, WHITE or SMOKE, and two different sizes. Please select from options menu above.
  • Current draw of 4 amps MAX on highest setting, 0.2amps on lowest setting
  • Rooflight cutout 406 x 406mm on KI40 Models and 353 x 353mm on KI models (see dimensions document below)
  • Back up controls for manual operation
  • Intake or expel settings
  • Flyscreen to keep bugs out of the motorhome
  • Only 132mm above roof when closed
  • Interior garnish suitable for a roof thickness of 78mm (for roof thickness in excess 78mm a separate garnish will be required with a max depth of 138mm)
  • 2-Year Limited Warranty with Lifetime Limited Warranty on lid
Product Warranty: 2 year limited warranty
Product Availability: In stock & sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Coleman Mach 8  Ultra Low Profile Air Conditioner For Campervans, Motorhomes and Caravans
Product Description:
Coleman Mach 8 Ultra Low Profile Air Conditioner For Campervans, Motorhomes and Caravan

American RV Favourite, with Low-Profile Euro Style

Fresh from the American RV market, the Mach 8 from Coleman Mach, is an Ultra low profile Air conditioner unit, with the power to handle RV type ambient temperatures, yet with a sleek and low european profile to suit your Campervan, Motorhome or Caravan.

Power for larger Motorhomes and Caravans

With it's 3100 watts cooling output, the Coleman Mach 8 is suitable for Campervans, or Motorhomes and Caravans up to 10m in length, making it one of the most powerful Air Conditioning Units in the UK market today.

Specifications

  • Dimensions of roof unit (L x W X D) 1044mm x 721mm x 210mm
  • Deluxe version (Cool and heat) or Standard version (Cooling only) Please select from menu.
  • Cooling Capacity 3100 Watts or 10.600 BTU
  • Operating Voltage 230v
  • Power consumption when cooling 1220 Watts
  • Power consumption when heating (Deluxe Version only)1220 Watts
  • Ceiling unit dimensions:(L x W X H) 560mm x 530mm x 50mm
  • MAX start up current 15 amps
  • Remote control supplied with Deluxe version only
  • Weight 47Kg
  • 2 Year Warranty

Features

  • Low Profile High power (210mm from roof)
  • Motorhomes and caravans up to 10 meters
  • Temperature sensing remotely on handset
  • Independant air movers (Indoor and Outdoor)
  • MAX roof thicknes of 150mm
  • Required roof opening 360mm x 360mm + 400mm x 400mm
  • Aerodynamic curve to decrease wind drag and improve fuel efficiency

Gas Lockers For Campervan, Caravan, Or Motorhome

This listing is for gas lockers ONLY, for Gas lockers with installation kit See Here

Product Name: Plastica Above Ground AG Swimming & Ornamental Pool Pump
Product Description:
Plastica AG Pool Pump

The Argonaut’s little brother (can even be used with sea water)

The Plastica AG pump has the same superior build quality ensuring performance durability and reliability.  With its mechanical seal made with AISI 316 Stainless steel the AG pool pump is ideal for a range of pool applications including chlorine, bromine, iodine & sea water. It's an ideal pump for above ground swimming pools and ornamental pools.

Ranging in size from .25hp to .66hp

All IP55 rated motors include a Stainless steel shaft and range from 0.25 Horse Power (0.19 KW) to 0.66 Horse Power (0.49 KW). The Plastica AG pump is an outstanding choice for those smaller applications.

Flow Chart

Plastica Above Ground AG Swimming Pool Pump Features:-

  • Easy maintenance
  • Self priming up to 1.8 metres
  • Quiet running
  • Polypropylene glass filled pump body
  • Stainless steel AISI 316 steel shaft
  • Can be used with salt pools up to a concentration of 0.4%
  • Good chemical resistance
  • 2¼ Inch BSP External threaded ports
  • Union ABS 50mm ID & 1½ Inch ID

Product Description:
Clever Pool Pump Inverter

The Clever Pool pump inverter provides an easy and cost efficient method of controlling a swimming pool pump. Offering savings of up to 80% on energy consumption the clever pool pump inverter is suitable for a single phase swimming pool pump up to 2HP.

User Friendly

Easily controlled from the LCD screen the Clever Pool pump inverter allows four different timing periods within 24 hours where the user can set the pump speed for the most efficient operation of the pool. The clever pool pump inverter default settings are: Low RPM (1200), Medium RPM (1800), High RPM (2100) and Backwash (2800). In manual mode the user can adjust all pump speeds.

Clever Pool pump Inverter Benefits

  • Savings of up to 80% on swimming pool pump energy usage
  • Simple installation
  • Reduces noise and wear and tear on the pool pump
  • Easy to use with LCD screen

The Clever Pool pump inverter is supplied with a 2.5m cable to pump and 90cm cable to plug and is compatible with 95% of single speed pool pumps.
Product Availability: delivery of the clever pool pump inverter is 2-3 working days

Product Name: Dometic Waeco CoolFreeze CF11 Portable Car Fridge Freezer
Product Description:
Dometic Waeco CoolFreeze CF11 Portable Car Fridge Freezer


Boasting a capacity of 10.5 litres, the Dometic Waeco CoolFreeze CF 11 portable compressor freidge freezer is not only compact and lightweight, but also incredibly energy efficient, allowing it to run on either 12V or 24V battery power, or 100 - 230V mains. Despite its impressive capacity, it is small enough to fit in tight spaces with a width of under 24cm!

Wide cooling range!

The Dometic Waeco CF11 is able to operate within a range of +10°C all the way down to -18°C, allowing it to be used as a fridge for storing chilled food and drinks or even a deep freeze for transporting frozen items, has a digital temperature display for instant readout and control of the internal temperature, and also features integrated drinks holders.

Built to last

As with all Dometic products, the CoolFreeze CF11 fridge freezeris constructed from robust and hard-wearing external materials and the compressor components are designed to last many years.

Product Name: Certikin OC-1 Filtration Swimming Pool Media (50 litre bag)
Product Description:
Certikin OC-1 Swimming Pool Filter Media

Filter media has moved on in a big way

The introduction by Certikin of OC-1 filtration media has made waves in the pool industry.  It's been taken as read that it's sand or glass variations for you pool filter tank, but not anymore, Certikin OC-1 has arrived and has outstanding features that provide a worthwhile alternative.

OC-1 Filter media’s key benefits

Energy consumption reduced (flow rate is maintained avoiding heaters etc cutting out)

OC-1 keeps constant flow rates even when the media becomes very dirty, unlike regular sand or glass swimming pool media. Heaters and salt chlorinators are not going to turn off due to low a flow rate.

0C1 has a huge 20 times more capacity than sand or glass pool media

Reduces the need for regular backwashing and provides a more efficient backwash, OC1 in turn reduces water consumption, chemical usage & heating costs.

Lightweight

OC1 filter media can even be shipped already inside the filter, easy to handle quick to install.

Reduced Maintenance

OC-1 lasts longer than sand, reduces pressure on the system which in turn extends the life of your pool equipment.

Filters to all International standards.

Suitable for ALL installations - domestic or commercial, outdoor or indoor, new Installs & existing filters.

Recyclable at the end of its life.

Typical Payback 6-12 months.

Product Name: Truma VarioHeat Eco Blown Air Campervan Motorhome Caravan Heater
Product Description:
Truma VarioHeat Eco Blown Air Campervan Motorhome Caravan Heater Kit

The Truma VarioHeat ECO With Analog Dial

A compact, lightweight and efficient Blown Air Campervan gas heater, replacing the popular Truma E2400

Recommended for smaller to medium sized Campervans, Motorhomes or Caravans. for larger Campervans see the Truma VarioHeat Comfort

Rapid heat and economical temperature sustained

The Varioheat Eco is a quick and efficient way to bring your Campervan or motorhome to a comfortable temperature.  The boost function is the quickest way to bring the Caravan to the desired temperature, whilst the ECO (or night) function, will operate at it's most efficient 1300 watts whilst you sleep.

Please note:

  • For a new installation you'll need to purchase a length of ducting and a air outlet vent along with this kit.
  •  If you order without the cowl, the exhaust ducting (black and silver ducts) are NOT included.

Technical Specifications

  • Operating pressure 30Mb
  • Rated heat output 1300/2800 Watts
  • Fuel consumption100/220 G/H
  • Air pumping capacity 75/155 m3/h
  • Current consumption 0.65/2.75 Amp
  • Power Supply12v DC
  • Dimensions (L x W x H) 400 x 284 x 123mm
  • Weight 5.5 kg
  • Propane or Butane Operation (Calor Gas)

Features

  • High-performance, compact gas heater of the latest generation. Suitable for small campervan, motorhome and caravan.
  • Automatic regulation of the heating output depending on the set temperature
  • Exact settings for equired room temperature
  • Lightweight and compact, minimal space required for installation
  • Even heat distribution in the vehicle via air outlets
  • Includes Cowl kit (Options Cream or Black)

 See the short video

Also available the new Truma E Kit (Can be retro fitted to the Varioheat)

E Kit the additional electric heater, for more information click the image!

Product Name: Truma Combi D4E Diesel Air and Water Heater Kit
Product Description:
Truma Combi D4E Combined Diesel Water and Air Space Heater

The Truma Combi combination boiler and heater range is a popular choice for heating both water and living spaces in your campervan, motorhome or caravan. The Combi heaters are both energy efficient and quiet in operation, and incredibly compact for the performance heating they offer.

Great for caravan or motorhome adventures in both summer and winter

Featuring all the benefits found with the standard Truma Combi range but with a diesel heater instead of gas, and alongside an electric element, the Combi D4E is an effective heating solution. Using widely available diesel fuel instead of gas provides confidence of gaining access to fuel, and easier to source, to those travelling further afield.

With an integrated 10 litre stainless steel water tank, the Truma D4E Combi heater with the independent controls, allows heating of hot water only in summer mode as well as both hot water and warm air during colder winter months.

Effective Air Space Heating

With 4 heated air outlets, the Truma Combi D4E will provide ample heating within the living space of your motorhome, caravan or campervan. Combined with the digital Truma I-net X control panel, the Combi D4E provides fingertip control over heater functions when needed. 

Versatile Operation

Depending upon your needs this kit can operate on either 230V electric mains voltage, with diesel fuel or both together. The Truma Combi D4E heater model can provide hot water, and a warm living space, whether on a mains powered camping site, or out off-grid in the wild. For quickly heating your motorhome or caravan when on pitched up on site, you can use both electric and diesel energy sources in conjunction for rapid heating speeds.

The Truma Combi D4E Kit Includes

  • Truma Combi D4E diesel and electric heater unit
  • Truma iNet X digital control panel
  • John Guest water kit
  • 6 metres control panel cable
  • Truma Combi diesel exhaust kit 
  • Truma universal fuel take off kit (works with most vehicle standard fuel senders)
  • Japan Solderless Terminal electrical ends
  • Truma installation and operation instructions
  • Frost control unit
  • Please note that the Truma Room Temperature Sensor Cable is not included in the kit.
  • Please note - New installations will require warm air distribution ducting.

Truma iNet X control panel with Bluetooth iNet X App

The Combi D4E kit from Truma includes the innovative I-Net X digital control panel. The Truma iNet X system allows convenient control of your Combi D6E from your tablet or mobile phone via a Bluetooth app. In addition, if you have a Truma air conditioning unit, the control panel can automatically co-ordinate the heater and air conditioning to ensure your living space maintains a comfortable environment (please note a TIN distributor is required to connect 2 appliances to the iNet X control panel)

Truma Combi Heater Technical Specifications

Combi D4E Specifications
Dimensions (L x W x H) 525 x 450 x 300 mm
Installation Dimensions (L x W x H) 540 x 500 x 350 mm*
Unit Weight (without water) 16.8kg
Heating Time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Water Only) Approx. 20min
Heating Time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Heater + Water) Approx. 80min
Rated Thermal Output in Watts (Diesel) Up to 4000W
Rater Thermal Output in Watts (Electric) 900W
Rater Thermal Output in Watts (Diesel & Electric Comb.) 3800W
Fuel Consumption 100 - 400ml/h
Water Capacity 10 Litres
Air Flow Rate 287 m³/h
Power Consumption (at 230V) 3.9A / 7.8A
Power Consumption (at 12V) Heating up boiler 1.8A up to temp max. of 4.0A
Water Pressure Max 2.8 Bar
Fuel Line Length 5M

 *Please note in addition to the installation dimensions, extra space must be provided as appropriate for the diesel and water connections as well as the drain valve.

Product Name: Dometic CombiCool ACX 30 3-Way Coolbox Fridge Freezer
Product Description:
Dometic CombiCool ACX3 30 Coolbox Fridge Freezer 3-Way

With a capacity of 33 litres and an operational cooling capability of up to 30°C below ambient temperature, the Dometic CombiCool ACX 35 cool box is not only stylish, but also practical and convenient! With the ability to run off 12v DC, 230V AC, and even butane LPG gas, the Dometic ACX3 35 is ideal for picnics, camping trips, festivals, and other outings where access to mains power may be limited or unavailable.

Silent in operation, energy efficient

The Dometic ACX 35 uses absorption cooling technology, which not only makes it ultra-efficient and flexible in power source, but also means it is entirely silent in operation. The evaporator includes space for an ice cube tray (included), and as with all Dometic products, the ACX 35 is sturdy and built to last.

Dometic Combicool ACX35 Key Features:

  • Cools up to 30°C below the ambient temperature
  • Can be powered by butane gas, 12V DC and 230V Mains
  • Suitable for use with standard gas cylinders (Camping Gaz, Calor Gas etc.)
  • Silent in operation
  • Vertical space for 1.5L and 2L bottles
  • Piezo ignition

Product Name: Dometic CFX3-55IM Portable Compressor Cool Box Fridge and Freezer With Ice Maker Function
Product Description:
Dometic CFX3-55IM Portable Compressor Cool Box Fridge and Freezer With Ice Maker Function

46 Litre Mobile Cool Box and Freezer

Whether on-road, off-road, on the water or anywhere the Dometic Waeco CFX3 keeps food fresh and drinks cold. The heavy duty Dometic Waeco CFX3 55IM is built for a tough endurance even in the most extreme of conditions and is capable of high performance cooling even in the warmest of weather!

Dometic CFX3 55IM compressor fridge and freezer features:

  • Dometic CFX3 features a generous storage capacity of 48 litres, ideal for caravan or motorhome.
  • Rapid Freeze Plate and included silicon ice trays produces ice in a matter of hours
  • Heavy-duty but lightweight ExoFrame construction with fender frame protected edges.
  • Strong aluminium alloy handles.
  • Powerful VMSO3 compressor cooling technology efficiently refrigerates and deep-freezes to –22 °C
  • Easy-to-read High-Resolution Colour Display and soft touch buttons enabling seamless control and monitoring of cool box performance
  • CFX3 App allows temperature control via WiFi or Bluetooth and provides performance history
  • 3-stage dynamic battery protection system prevents dead car battery or allows deep draw on dual batteries.
  • The dometic CFX3 has removable wire baskets with dividers for optimal storage organisation.
  • Robust construction, the Dometic CFX3 55IM is built for the outdoors.
  • A++ rating
  • New 2020 model.

Specification:

  • Model: CFX3 5IM
  • Box contents: 1 cooler, 1 manual, 1 Connection cable for 12/24V connection, 1 Connection cable for 100-240V connection, 1 icemaker, removable wire baskets
  • Colour: Smokey Grey
  • A++ energy rating

Dimensions:

  • Dimensions: depth 455 mm, height 480 mm, width 720 mm
  • Net weight: 21.3 kg
  • Gross volume: 55 L
  • Storage volume: 46 L

Performance:

  • Input voltage (AC) 100-240 V 
  • Input voltage (DC) 12/24 V
  • Input frequency 50/60 Hz

Product Description:
Elite 1000 or 500 Watt Modified Sine Wave Inverter

Overview

Elite Power inverters are a high quality product, all products are supplied with heavy duty leads fitted with terminal rings for easy connectivity to your campervan or motorhome battery.

Elite power inverters have multiple uses, whether at home, in outbuildings,in your  Campervan Caravan, Motorhome, Car, Truck or Boat the Elite range inverters give you a 220-240V power supply wherever you may need it.

Elite 1000 watt Modified Sine Wave Inverter Features

  • Low Battery- Voltage Alarm (volt):10.5v+0.5v
  • Efficiency: 85-90
  • 12v inverter
  • Output Waveform: Modified Sine Wave
  • Output Voltage Range: AC 220-240v
  • Input Voltage: 12V (11-15v DC)
  • Black aluminium case
  • Cooling Mode: Fan
  • Low Battery- Voltage Alarm (volt):10.5v+0.5v
  • Low Battery-Voltage Shutdown (volt):10v+0.5v
  • 1000 Watts Peak Surge (1000 watt) 500 watt peak surge (500 watt)
  • 1000 watt unit is an Ideal Campervan Inverter for Microwaves up to 700 Watts

The domestic Certikin OC-1 swimming pool filter ships ready for use with the market-leading Certikin OC-1 filter media with a full 2 year warranty on the tank itself followed by a further pro-rata warranty up to 10 years in duration!

Product Name: Dometic Waeco Cool-Ice WCI 33 Portable Coolbox
Product Description:
Dometic Waeco Cool-Ice WCI33 Portable Coolbox

The Dometic Waeco Cool-ice WCI33 cool box is designed to keep ice for anything up to 10 days depending on model usage and conditions that it’s used in. Popular for weekend getaways and camping trips and robust enough to deal with the continuous exposure to weather experienced on boats, the WCI33 is a robust all rounder.

With impact resistant, seamless rotomoulded plastic this Dometic Waeco coolbox boasts "indestructible" durability with a unique labyrinth seal design to ensure superior ice storage. With food grade polyethylene construction and refrigeration grade foam insulation the Dometic WCI 33 is hygienic and easy to clean with A+++ efficiency rating.

Dometic Waeco Cool Ice WCI-33 Key Features:-

  • Low heat absorption
  • Seamless casing
  • Highly durable for the toughest conditions
  • 5 year guarantee!
  • Melt water drain plug
  • Steel Pin Hinges
  • ABS Clasps for easy lock and seal
  • Large none slip feet
  • Keeps ice frozen for several days
  • Food grade polyethylene CFC free material
  • Durable, hygienic and easy to clean
  • A+++ efficiency rating
  • Handy shoulder strap

 

Best Usage:

  • Chill all groceries and drinks before use and pack the boxes as full as possible(standard freezer packs or ice cubes are suitable as coolants).
  • Store the ice box in a cool area for several hours before and during use, making sure to keep it out of direct sunlight.
  • Please avoid opening the coolbox unnecessarily as air will compromise the cooling capacity and limit the cooling duration.
  • Ambient temperatures still play a part in the capacity to keep ice for longer so please be aware that the maximum time given for keeping ice can vary due to this.
Product Availability: The Dometic Waeco WCI33 is sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Truma Combi 4E Boiler and Space Heater Kit Campervan Motorhome
Product Description:
Truma Combi 4E Combination Boiler and Space Heater Campervan Motorhome

The Truma Combi 4E is a popular choice for heating both water and living spaces in your campervan, motorhome or caravan. The Combi 4E is energy efficient and quiet in operation, and incredibly compact and lightweight for the performance it offers.

i-Net Ready

Ready for installation with the i-Net controller (See below) which enables the Truma Combi 4e to be operated via Bluetooth and via the Truma app.

The i-Net system control box also allows your i-Net ready truma air conditioner  to be used in conjunction with your Truma heating system, for total environmental control via App or Bluetooth in your Caravan Campervan or Motorhome,

Suitable for all seasons

Featuring an integrated 10 litre stainless steel water tank, the Combi 4E allows for independent heating of hot water in summer mode as well as both hot water and warm air in winter mode.

Versatile operation on LPG gas or electric

Able to operate on either 230V electric mains voltage or on LPG, the Combi 4E provides hot water, and a warm campervan, motorhome, or caravan, whether on a camping site, or in the wild. You can even use both electric and gas energy sources in unison for rapid heating times.

The Combi 4E kit contains:

  • Truma Combi 4E LPG gas and 230V electric unit
  • Truma CP Plus digital control panel
  • John Guest connection kit

Includes digital wall mounted control panel

The Truma Combi 4E kit includes a digital wall-mounted control panel which is also iNet ready*. The Truma iNet system allows convenient control of your Combi 4E from your mobile phone or tablet via an app. Additionally, if you have a Truma air-conditioning unit installed, the control panel can automatically co-ordinate the heater and air conditioning unit to ensure your living space maintains a comfortable and controlled environment.

Please note that the Truma Room Temperature Sensor Cable is not included in the kit.

Truma Combi 4E Technical Specifications

  • Heater model: Truma Combi 4E
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): 510 x 450 x 300 mm
  • Installation dimensions (L x W x H): 540 x 500 x 350mm**
  • Weight (when empty of water): 15.1kg
  • Heating time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Water only): Approx. 20min.
  • Heating time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Heater + Water): Approx. 80min.
  • Rated thermal output (Electric): 900/1800W
  • Rated thermal output (Gas): 2000/4000W
  • Rated thermal output (Electric & Gas Combined): 3800W
  • Fuel consumption (Gas): 160–320 g/h
  • Water capacity: 10 litres
  • Air flow rate: Max. 287 m3/h
  • Power consumption (at 230V): 3.9A / 7.8A
  • Power consumption (at 12V): Heating up boiler 0.2A up to temporary max. of 5.6A (average approx. 1.1A)
  • Water pressure: MAX 2.8 Bar
  • Please note: Combi comes with black cowl as standard.

    **Please note in addition to the installation dimensions, extra space must be provided as appropriate for the gas and water connections as well as the drain valve.

Product Description:
Avtex SB195BT Soundbar for Avtex 12v Campervan Caravan Motorhome TV

Product Description

The Avtex SB195BT soundbar is the perfect compliment to an Avtex 9 series PRO TV/DVD, or any Avtex TV/DVD to bring an enhanced, immersive viewing experience to your caravan, campervan or motorhome with crystal clear sound.

A stylish audio solution, the Avtex SB195BT TV soundbar doubles as a Bluetooth speaker system, offering the facility to wirelessly stream music in your caravan, campervan or motorhome, or in the awning.

This Avtex soundbar is backwards compatible almost any Avtex caravan campervan or motorhome TV, and comes with the necessary cables to connect via HDMI Arc (recommended for combining the soundbar with an Avtex Series 9 TV), coaxial audio (recommended for combining the soundbar with an Avtex Series 8 TV) and audio jack (for connecting to older sets).

Avtex Soundbar Features.

  • Simple to set-up
  • Bluetooth wireless music streaming
  • Extremely compact design
  • Graphic Equaliser Settings settings
  • Extensive tonal range for a crstal clear sound experience
  • Four speaker driver system

Specifications

  • Power consumption: 12V 0.75A / 24V 0.42A
  • Size: W436 x H68 x D46mm
  • Power output: 2 x 10W

A great choice for heating both water and living spaces in a larger campervan, motorhome or caravan, the Truma Combi 6E water boiler and space heater is energy efficient, quiet in operation, and incredibly compact and lightweight for the performance it offers.

Ideal for summer and winter!

Featuring an integrated 10 litre stainless steel water tank, the Combi 6E allows for independent heating of hot water in summer mode as well as both hot water and warm air in winter mode.

Versatile operation on 230V electric or LPG gas

Product Name: Truma Level Control LPG Gas Checker Monitor for Caravans & Motorhomes
Product Description:
Truma Level Control

Checking your LPG gas level was never easier (even when you’re not there)

Using ultrasound the Truma Level Control quickly checks the state of you gas bottle with the help of the free Truma Smartphone app you'll have an idea of how long the gas should last.  Caravan & motor home owners can say goodbye to guessing or picking the bottle up and shaking it to see what's left.

Just check the app on your phone and see the result

The Truma Level Control accurately gauges the gas level of steel or aluminium LPG bottles with a diameter of 200 to 350 mm.  The gas level is displayed either as a percentage or in kilograms as well as how long the gas will last in days.  Uses Blue tooth if your in range or SMS if outside the range.

Attaching the Level Control to the gas cylinder

The Truma Level Control is attached to the steel gas cylinder using the integrated magnet. Aluminium gas bottles require a clamping sheet. When replacing the gas cylinder just remove the sensor and attach it to the new full gas bottle. A handy sign reminds you to remove the Truma Level Control from the cylinder before you return it.

If you have two gas bottles

You can use a separate Truma Level Control for each cylinder. The Truma App then shows you the level of gas in each cylinder. When the gas is getting low you’ll receive an SMS alert.

Won't work with:

Please note the sensor is not suitable for plastic gas cylinders, refillable gas cylinders, gas tanks or butane cylinders (Camping Gaz)

Operating Instructions

Product Name: Truma Ultraflow Water Replacement Filter Cartridge for Caravan and Motorhomes
Product Description:
Truma Ultraflow Replacement Water Filter Cartridge for Caravans and Motorhomes

Ensure your water is effectively filtered for longer!

The Ultraflow Replacement Filter from Truma can be used within the Ultraflow Filter Housing or the older Crystal II filter housing systems. Fitted with active carbon blocking technology which helps remove any unwanted odours, tastes and even colours from your fresh water supply.

Features:

  • Long Lasting (Lifetime up to 35 Days)
  • No Loose Carbon Particles in Water System
  • Less Water Waste
  • More Efficiency
  • High Standard of Water Filtration
  • Easily Changeable

After Installation:

Please drain first few litres of water until the water runs clear. You can then use the dial on your filter housing as a guide to replace the filter, do this approximately 35 days after installation.

Product Name: Dometic FreshJet FJX7 3500 Motorhome Inverter Air Conditioner
Product Description:
Dometic FreshJet FJX7 3500 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner

Efficient and Consistent Campervan Air Conditioning with a Low-Key Design

Manage the temperature on your next adventure with the Dometic Freshjet FJX7 3500 Air Conditioner, a professional class Air Conditioner produced by Dometic. The Air Conditioning Unit comes fitted with the latest speed-controlled inverter compressor and heat pump technology. This will allow you to quickly, quietly and efficiently cool or heat your caravan, motorhome or campervan! The Air Conditioner is a roof unit and needs to be fitted to the rooftop. The design is sleek, elegant and minimalistic with an LED light curve to complement your caravan / motorhome's aesthetics and provide an element of ambiance at night.

Powerful Motorhome Air Conditioning that Utilises Smart Technology

The Dometic Freshjet FJX7 3500 Rooftop Air Conditioner is equipped with Smart connectivity features, which will allow users to control the heating through a range of convenient touchpoints, such as the smart phone app, a remote control or the built-in touch screen interface. The compressor does not only work via the traditional method of an On/Off switch, but via Integrated Smart Technology. The compressor adapts automatically to environmental demands, helping to save both time from adjusting the temperature and energy from turning the device on and off throughout the day. The air conditioner is the perfect addition to help modify any caravan or motorhome into a mobile smart mobile-home! The integrated CleanAir system helps to maintain Air Quality within a Caravan or Motorhome by keeping the air fresh and clear, and working to remove allergens, bacteria and mould. You can switch between heating and cooling, set a desired temperature, dehumidify, ventilate, set a desired temperature - or simply activate auto mode and let the smart technology take over!

Discreet and Compact Caravan Air Conditioning

The Dometic FreshJet FJX7 3500 Roof Air Conditioner is one of the most lightweight and ultra-compact motorhome / caravan air conditioners in all of Europe. It is ideal for motorhomes or caravans up to 7m in length, and all campervans models because of it's small design and powerful features. The sleep mode feature reduces fan speed by 80%, creating a peaceful, temperature-controlled environment to enjoy late nights in your campervan.

Dometic Freshjet  FJX7 3500 Motorhome / Campervan Roof Air Conditioner - Features:

  • The flagship motorhome & caravan air conditioner in the Dometic range
  • Cooling and Heating Functionality
  • Superior Air Regulation Technology - motorhomes, caravans or campervans can be cooled at a rapid pace.
  • Superior Energy Efficiency - Advanced compressor and Heat Pump technology reduce general power consumption of the device
  • Sleep mode - Fan speed reduces by 80% to minimise noise within the motorhome when in operation
  • Advanced Soft Start Function - quiet and gentle air conditioner start-up
  • Whisper-quiet operation - with its variable dual-cylinder compressor speed, the FJX7 operates silently while maintaining the desired temperature in your campervan / motorhome
  • Remote control included as standard
  • Dometic Climate App - utilise the modern functionalities by controlling your roof air conditioner from the convenience of your smartphone
  • Touchscreen functionalities for quick-fix temperature control
  • Clean Air Purify Technology - effectively reduces bacteria, odours and other pollutants to keep your motorhome, caravan or campervan smelling fresh and clean.
  • Outlet fans are vertically adjustable, allowing for individual airflow regulation if desired
  • Optimised Airflow - new low-profile air distribution box with powerful front and back airflow
  • Low-key and compact design makes the Air conditioner a stealthy upgrade to your campervan or motorhome
  • Built-in LEDs for a gentle ambient light
  • Re-usable dust filter, easy for cleaning
  • Exclusive premium design - aerodynamically shaped rooftop with eye catching LED light curve 

Dometic FreshJet 3500 Caravan & Motorhome Air Conditioner - Specifications:

  • Best suited for caravans, campervans or motorhomes with a vehicle length of over 8 metres
  • Cooling Capacity of 3500 watts
  • Heating Capacity of 3000 watts
  • Removes excess humidity from air
  • Includes ventilation mode, ideal for cooking
  • Available in either black (sku: 9600050996) or white (sku: 9600050997)
Product Warranty: Dometic FreshJet 3500 air conditioners come with a two year warranty.

Product Name: Truma Combi Control Panel - Classic or CP Plus Digital iNet
Product Description:
Truma Combi Control Panel - Classic or CP Plus Digital iNet


Available with either the classic dial or the newer CP Plus digital interface, the Truma Combi control panel is required to control your Combi heater and boiler.

Suitability for your Truma Combi

The suitability for your Combi depends on which PCB (the internal circuit board) version you have on your Combi unit. Put simply, the newer the Combi unit you own, the later the version you will have.

Truma CP Plus Digital Control Panel

For users with the latest Combi models (version 05 PCB onward for LPG gas "Combi" models, version 06 PCB onward for diesel "Combi D" models - please see below) the CP Plus control panel is compatible.

Truma Classic Standard Control Panel

For users with older Combi models (earlier than version 05 PCB for LPG gas "Combi" models, version 06 PCB for diesel "Combi D" models), only the standard Classic control panel is suitable.

Which version do I have?

The version 05 LPG gas models and version 06 diesel models were introduced in approx. 2014/2015 and usually feature a black outer casing instead of grey. You can find out the version you have by removing the rear access panel on the Combi unit which exposes the top of the circuit board (PCB) which contains a white label usually found on the top left. This will then indicate which version you have for example: V05.00.00 - in this instance the PCB would be version 05.

Can I change my older PCB to use the new CP Plus control panel?

This is possible for LPG models with the addition of a new Combi version 5 PCB and an updated power unit. We are able to supply these two components for users wishing to upgrade, please call us for advice.

CP Plus Digital Control Panel - iNet Ready

The CP Plus control panel is not only easier to use and read thanks to its digital display, but also compatible with the Truma iNet system when paired with the intelligent iNet control box. The iNet system allows remote control of your Combi system via an app for your mobile smartphone*. The Truma iNet system and CP Plus control panel can also work with other Truma appliances including the Aventa and Saphir range of devices.

*Truma iNet app only available on most common iPhone and Android smartphones.
Not all features available on all handsets.
Product Availability: The Truma Combi Classic and CP Plus control panels are available on 2-4 working days delivery.

Product Description:
The Dometic CRX 65D Fridge Freezer

The Dometic CRX 65D pull-out fridge freezer is designed with a convenient slide-out for easy access to your provisioning within your campervan or motorhome. This Dometic CRX65D can be used as a fridge, freezer or both. The freezer compartment can be detached easily to make room for any provisioning goods. The Dometic CRX65D electronic compressor and fan speed control ensures a quiet operation and an economical power consumption. This fridge/freezer comes supplied with silver-grey front panel.

Cool elegance and smart details:

The Dometic CRX65D fridge freezer drawer combines cool elegance and innovative features that offers 50 l of cool storage and an optimal 7 l of freezer space. The freezer compartment of the fridge can be removed easily to make more room for the fresh or frozen goods. This allows you to choose between a full fridge, freezer or the combination of the two. Your desired temperature is set on the easy to use touch control panel which is flush mounted in the inner wall and integrates the LED lights.

Features:

  • 3-in-1: Fridge, Freezer or Both
  • Convenient Slide-Out Access
  • Elegant Silver Grey Front Panel
  • Perfect for Campervans and Motorhomes

Diagnostics

  • CR/CRX Flashes Chart
  • Danfoss Compressor Diagnostics
  • Coolmatic CR Troubleshooter

Product Name: Truma 14 Litre Electric Caravan Motorhome Water Heater
Product Description:
Truma 14 Litre Electric Water Heater Boiler for Caravans, Motorhomes or Campervans

Running on 230V mains electric with a powerful 850 watt heating element and a large 14 litre water capacity as well as near-silent operation, the Truma Electric Water Heater is ideal for use as a water boiler for your caravan, campervan or motorhome. The water heater is simple to use with an on/off control panel.

Fast water heating and great thermal insulation

The Truma electric water heater can increase the temperature of your water from 15°C to 70°C in approx. 70 minutes. It is insulated using special expanded polypropylene foam, which is both lightweight and provides optimum insulation performance, with temperature dropping by just approx. 1°C per hour.

Safe for drinking water and high pressure water feeds

The heater is constructed from stainless steel and is safe for use with drinking water. Installation is quick and easy and the water heater is suitable for pressure-resistant John Guest hot water hoses with a diameter of 12mm, John Guest fittings and water systems up to a maximum of 2.8 bar (or higher with a pressure reducer).

Specifications

Power Supply: 230V 50Hz Electric
Power Consumption: 3.7A (850W)
Water Capacity: 14 Litres
Heating Time: approx. 70 minutes 15°C to 70°C
Temperature Limit: 70°C
Over-temperature Protection: 90°C
Pump Pressure: Max. 2.8 bar
System Pressure: Max. 4.5 bar
Weight (empty): approx. 3Kg
Dimensions (HxW): 295 x 405 mm
Application: Caravan Motorhome or Campervan

Product Description:
Sat-Fi EU Fully Automatic Satellite Dome w/ Auto Skew - Caravan & Motorhome

Satellite TV coverage across the UK & EU

This high-gain, high coverage satellite antenna system as access to a large number of satellite systems, allowing coverage across much of mainland Europe - as well as the UK. GPS-aided tracking provides auto-skewing to ensure the best possible TV reception.

Compact housing

The SatFi EU is fully housed to both protect the unit and minimise its drag once mounted on your vehicle. It features a wake-on-demand feature to save power, and automatic satellite switching for seamless multi-satellite viewing. It's ideal for use with motorhomes and caravans.

Sat-Fi EU Features:

  • Automatic DiSEqC satellite switching
  • Two-year warranty
  • High-gain Cassegrain reflector
  • GPS-aided LNB auto-skew
  • DVB-S2 satellite tracking
  • Can be updated via USB
  • TriSat satellite library (Astra 2 28E, Astra 1 19E & Hotbird 13E)
  • Suitable for motor home, caravan, campervan, horsebox, coach and inland waterways
  • Compact, modern design with compact high gain antenna

Product Name: Vitrifrigo SLIM150 Motorhome & Marine Fridge Freezer 12/24 Volts
Product Description:
Vitrifrigo SLIM150 12/24v Motorhome & Marine fridge freezer

The Vitrifrigo SLIM150 comes with 144 litres of storage and was developed as fridge freezer for Campervans and larger panel van conversions in the motorhome market, but it's also the ideal option for marine use thanks to its shallow depth & compact dimensions. Available in Black or Light Grey colour.

Key Features of the Vitrifrigo SLIM150

Angled roof and base to accommodate your motor home or boats curves!

At just 400mm wide and 450mm deep (front to back including the doors the SLIM150 also has an angled top and base to fit the curvature of the vehicle roof and floor of the vehicle.

Compressor is separate from the fridge freezer

To further maximise the volume of the Vitrifrigo SLIM150 the compressor is separate to the cabinet, supplied pre-charged with couplings, allowing it to be remotely mounted and then connected to the cabinet once installed. For marine applications this also gives us the option to water cool the compressor with the addition of a keel cooler, improving efficiency and saving power.

Finally a slim fridge freezer for your Motorhome or boat that ticks all the boxes

The main fridge with internal freezer compartment sits above a drawer fridge below. The fridge has an internal LED light, two 'lock in' shelves with fiddle up stands (plus the dividing shelf between the fridge and drawer below). The 16 litre insulated internal freezer box is 3 star rated. The internal height of the drawer is 365mm making it ideal for storage of large drinks bottles.  The SLIM150 doors use Vitrifrigo's innovative AIRLOCK catch system and both doors have a vent position to prevent unpleasant smells when the fridge is turned off.

Fast chill boost along with quiet running at night

The Vitrifrigo SLIM150 is controlled by a LED thermostat, with a graduated light to show how cold the temperature is set. It also has a fast chill boost setting to bring the fridge freezer down to temperature quicker and a night mode when the compressor is switched to its economy mode and the noise is minimised.  The Vitrifrigo SLIM150 is powered with a BD50 12/24 volt compressor, which can be easily upgraded to 12/24V and 110/240V.

 

 Night Mode

Lowest noise level and reduced consumption during night time. The compressor's rpm are reduced during Night time ensuring quietness and lowest Power consumption.

 

 

Turbo Mode

Fast chill setting allows the compressor to reach its maximum speed to get the temperature down as fast as possible.

 

 

 Vent Position

The "vent position" system keeps the fridge door slightly open preventing nasty odours when your RV is not in use.

 

 

Spacious 3 star freezer

The 16-litre three-star freezer can store frozen food at a temperature of -18°C.

 

 

  • Please ensure you have measured the fridge correctly before purchasing, re-stock fees can apply if a fridge has been opened.

Product Description:
Plastica Argonaut Swimming Pool Pump

Can even be used with sea water

The mechanical seal fitted on the Argonaut pool pump is suitable for a range of applications including chlorine, bromine, iodine and sea water (if flushed through with fresh water on shut down).

High performance, durability & reliability

For small to medium sized pools, spas, ponds and other recirculation applications. Incorporating many technical features that ensure a superb & reliable performance.

Quiet running

The Argonaut pump is extremely quiet when running and is therefore ideal for above ground installations e.g. spas etc.

TUV Approval

Argonaut pool pumps are TÜV approved re European norms EN60335-1 and EN60335-2-41.

Features

  • Three phase model
  • BSP 2 3/4" thread
  • Clear PC tank cover and large strainer basket
  • Compact design
  • Ingress protection: IPx5
  • Maintenance friendly
  • PP tank, high chemical resistance
  • Self priming up to 3 metres
  • Very very quiet running
  • Stainless steel AISI 316 shaft

Product Name: Eberspacher Airtronic D2L Motorhome Campervan Diesel Heater with Internal Mounting Plate
Option Set: Eberspacher D2L Universal Fuel Pick Kit
Product Description:
Eberspacher Airtronic D2L Diesel Air Space Heater with
EasyStart Control Panel for your Campervan or Motor home

Complete with an internal mounting plate, the Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater by Eberspacher is ideal for use in your campervan or as supplementary heating in your motor home. Being diesel powered makes the Airtronic D2L extremely practical for both availability of fuel and use off-grid. A popular choice for air space heating, the Airtronic D2L allows you to heat your living space without running the engine which means no more defrosting of windows your campervan or motorhome.

Compact, efficient and programmable!

Both compact and fuel efficient with fast heat-up times, the Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater is practical and economical. The Airtronic D2L is fully programmable using the new Eberspacher EasyStart Pro control panel. The EasyStart Pro control panel is also compatible with the Eberspacher EasyStart Web which allows control via the internet, smartphone apps, or even a smartwatch!

The Airtronic D2L is suitable for most environments!

With the ability to operate in both marine and road environments, at temperatures as low as -40°C and at altitudes as high as 3,000m (~9800ft), Eberspacher have ensured the Airtronic D2L is as flexible as possible and can be used anywhere you go.

Eberspacher D2L Fuel Pick Up Kits:

The Eberspacher D2L is a universal heater which will work with almost all vehicles, as long as you have the correct fuel pick up kit. Please see the table below which details which kit you will need for you vehicle and make the fuel kit selection in the above drop down menu.

Fuel Pick Kit Vehicle Compatibility Part Number
Ford Transit 29.2180.01.0432
Mercedes Sprinter / VW Crafter 29.2180.01.0418
New 2018 Mercedes Sprinter 29.2180.01.0420
New 2018 VW Crafter 29.2180.01.0422
Peugeot Boxer / Fiat Ducato / Citroen Relay / Iveco Daily 29.2180.01.0429
VW T5/T6 Vehicle (Already Supplied in the  T6 Main Kits)
See this page here
Renault Master with Pressure Regulating Valve 29.2180.01.0426

Airtronic D2L Complete Kit Contents

The Airtronic D2L is supplied as a full kit with everything you need to install it to you vehicle. This includes:

  • The new D2L is approx. 90% quieter than the previous D2 model
  • The new D2L model features a brushless motor providing 5000 hours service life against 3000 hours for the previous D2 model!
  • Internal plate to mount the D2L heater
  • Eberspacher Airtronic D2L 12v heater unit with fuel pump and holder
  • All wiring harness for vehicle with fuse holder
  • Eberspacher EasyStart Pro operation switch
  • Choice of fuel standpipe kit available for various vehicles (optional)
  • Exhaust with silencer
  • Combustion air inlet pipe
  • Hot air ducting
  • Ancillary hardware
  • All required clips, screws, and clamps
  • Old product code - 29.2112.00.0064
  • New product code - 29.2112.30.0007

 Downloads:

 

 

Eberspacher Troubleshooting Guide:
Product Warranty:
Jacksons Leisure Supplies are an authorised Eberspacher dealer. As such, our Airtronic D2L campervan and motorhome diesel heaters include a 3 year limited parts and labour warranty.

Your Eberspacher Airtronic D2L diesel heater must be installed by a suitably qualified engineer and in compliance with all industry application and safety regulations as well as manufacturer procedures and guidelines.

To maintain your 2nd and 3rd year warranty, your Airtronic D2L must be serviced in accordance with the manufacturers warranty terms and conditions by an accredited Eberspacher agent.

Product Name: 700K 2 Gas Cylinder Bottle Automatic Changeover Regulator Kit with OPSO
Product Description:
700K 2 Cylinder Gas Bottle Automatic Changeover Gas Regulator Kit with OPSO for Static Caravan

The 700K static caravan 2 cylinder gas changeover regulator kit with OPSO is a great option for those who want the convenience of having 2 gas bottles connected at the same time. In the event that the gas supplied from the service side should fail to maintain the correct pressure or deplete, the regulator on the 700K will automatically changeover to the second gas bottle, thus eliminating the need to manually change the gas bottle or switchover manually.

The 700K Automatic Gas Bottle Changeover Regulator features an Over Pressure Shut Off (OPSO) that completely stops the flow of gas when the outlet pressure rises above normal range.

700K Automatic Static Caravan Gas Bottle Changeover Kit

  • 700K Automatic changeover gas bottle regulator
  • OPSO (Over pressure shut off)
  • Bracket and screws
  • 2x W20 pigtails
  • 1/2" male and female ball valve with test point
  • Emergency instruction plaque

Specification

Part Number: MB2C-OPSOD
Capacity: 4.3Kg/hr
Max Inlet Pressure: 20bar
Max Outlet Pressure: 37mbar
OPSO: 100-110mbar
BS Certification: EN13786

Product Description:

The Dometic awning tie down kit enables you to firmly anchor awnings with support legs into the ground, ideal for windy days. The kit is designed for use with Dometic PerfectWall and PerfectRoof awnings, is easy to use and provides a firm hold for your awning in adverse conditions.

Robust and secure

The Dometic tie down kit consists of strong, adjustable straps with robust clasps. The coil springs relieve the strain in windy conditions, secured between the tension straps and the strong ground pegs. The awning kit is supplied in a fabric bag, ensuring the components are kept together, ready for use.

Truma Combi D6E Diesel Caravan Air and Water Heater Kit
Product Description:
Truma Combi D6E Diesel Water and Air Space Heater

Truma Combi Diesel Kit for your Motorhome Campervan Caravan

The Truma Combi D6E Diesel air space and water heater kit includes all the parts you need to install and operate the unit itself. Featuring all the benefits of the standard Truma Combi range but with a diesel heater instead of gas alongside an electric element, the Combi D6E is not only effective but also provides increased availability of fuel more suited to those traveling further afield.

Lightweight and compact

Although the Combi D6E is able to operate as both a hot water boiler and space heater, it is relatively small and lightweight. With an inbuilt 10 litre hot water storage tank, the Truma D6E is able to provide enough hot water for everyday tasks as well as heating your living space.

Flexibility to suit your needs

The Combi D6E has 4x heated air outlets allowing for effective heating of your living space. With its digital Truma I-net control panel the Combi D6E also allows you control over function at any moment, giving you easily adjustable options between hot air, hot water or even having both at once.

230V mains electric heater

The Combi D6E is able to operate on 230V mains in addition to the diesel heater. This not only allows you to heat water and living space air using diesel, but alternatively you can use the electric element when hook-up is available or diesel is unavailable, and you can even use both diesel and electric together for increased performance and efficiency.

The Truma Combi D6E kit includes:

  • Truma Combi D6E diesel and electric heater unit
  • Truma I-net digital control panel
  • John Guest water kit
  • 6 metres control panel cable
  • Truma Combi diesel exhaust/flue and air inlet kit
  • Truma universal fuel take off kit (works with most vehicle standard fuel senders)
  • Japan Solderless Terminal electrical ends
  • Truma installation and operation instructions
  • 2nd Generation includes frost control
  • Frost control unit

New installations will require warm air distribution ducting. Please note that the Truma Room Temperature Sensor Cable is not included in the kit.

Truma Combi D6E Generation 1 vs Generation 2

The Truma Combi D6E is a compact, combined hot air and hot water system for motorhomes and campervans. It’s perfect for heating your living space and providing hot water, all in one unit.

Key Differences:

  • High Altitude Kit: The Generation 2 comes with a high-altitude kit, which helps the system work well at higher elevations.
  • Advanced Control Panel with iNet X: The Truma Combi D6E generation 1 comes with the CP-Plus digital control panel, The Generation 2 features the Advanced Truma iNet X control panel. (No longer available)

Truma iNet control panel

The Combi D6E kit from Truma includes the innovative I-Net digital control panel. In addition, if you have a Truma air conditioning unit, the control panel can automatically co-ordinate the heater and air conditioning to ensure your living space maintains a comfortable environment (please note a TIN distributor is required to connect 2 appliances to the iNet X control panel)

Please note that ducting is NOT included with the Truma Combi D6E but can be purchased here

D6E Heater Technical Specifications

Combi D6E Specifications
Dimensions (L x W x H) 525 x 450 x 300 mm
Installation Dimensions (L x W x H) 540 x 500 x 350 mm
Unit Weight (Without Water) 16.9 kg
Heating Time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Water Only) Approx. 20 min
Heating Time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Heater + Water) Approx. 80 min
Rated Thermal Output (Diesel) Up to 6000 W
Rated Thermal Output (Electric) 1800 W
Rated Thermal Output (Diesel & Electric Comb.) 5800 W
Fuel Consumption 200 - 630 ml/h
Water Capacity 10 Litres
Air Flow Rate 287 m³/h
Power Consumption (at 230V) 3.9 A / 7.8 A
Power Consumption (at 12V) Heating up boiler 1.8A up to temp max. of 4.0A
Water Pressure Max. 2.8 Bar

*Please be aware that in addition to the installation dimensions, some additional space must be provided as appropriate for the diesel and water connections as well as the drain valve.

Product Name: Truma Combi 2E Boiler and Space Heater Kit Campervan Motorhome
Product Description:
Truma Combi 2E water and Air Space Heater for Caravan Campervan or Motorhome

The Combi 2E water boiler and air space heater from Truma is an ideal entry-level choice for heating both water and living spaces in your motorhome campervan or caravan.

Small and lightweight

Despite containing both gas and electric heating elements, and an integrated 10 litre stainless steel hot water tank, the Combi 2E is relatively compact and light for the performance and versatility it offers. The integrated hot water tank holds enough water for every day tasks such as washing hands and short showers.

Able to operate on LPG gas or electric

With both propane/butane LPG gas and 230V mains electric heating elements, the Combi 2E provides hot water, and a warm campervan motorhome or caravan, whether on a camping site, or in the wild. You can even use both electric and gas energy sources in unison for rapid heating times.

The Combi 2E  kit contains:

  • Truma Combi 2E LPG gas and 230V electric unit
  • Truma CP Plus digital control panel
  • John Guest water connection kit
  • ZR80 exhaust ducting 1m
  • ZRS clip
  • Truma Combi CP Plus cable 6m
  • Side wall cowl in black
  • JST electrical ends
  • Installation and operation manuals

The only other parts you will require are the ducting and outlet vents as detailed below. Please note that the Truma Room Temperature Sensor Cable is not included in the kit.

Truma CP Plus digital control panel included!

The Truma Combi 2E kit includes the Truma CP Plus digital control panel. The CP Plus control panel is also iNet ready*. The Truma iNet system enables control of your Combi 2E from your tablet or mobile phone via an app. Additionally, if you have a Truma air-conditioning unit installed, the control panel can automatically co-ordinate the heater and air conditioning unit to ensure your living space maintains a comfortable and controlled environment.

* To use the Truma iNet system with your Combi 2E you will need a Truma iNet controller available here.

Additional extra's for new Combi 2E installations

Please note that ducting and blown air outlet vents are NOT included with the Truma Combi 2E. For a new installation you will usually require appropriate ducting and heater outlet vents.

Click here to purchase ducting

Click here to purchase heater outlet vents

  • Dimensions (L x W x H): 510 x 450 x 300 mm
  • Installation dimensions (L x W x H): 540 x 500 x 350mm**

Product Name: Dometic SunProtect Side Panel for Awnings
Product Description:
Dometic Sun Protection Panel for Awnings

The Dometic SunProtect Panel is manufactured from breathable material which allows light to shine through while keeping the heat of the sun out this translucent awning attachment is available in a range of widths.

Dometic SunProtect Features:

  • Keeps your awning cool
  • Lengths range from 2.6m to 6m
  • Permeable screen fabric

Offering you years of reliable use, the Dometic SunProtect panels will fit most models of Dometic awnings, helping you create an extra barrier against the elements, with extensions of 2.5 metres and a range of widths from 2.6 metres to 6 metres.
