Product Description:
Road Pod the Instant Camper Van Solution

Transform your everyday van into a mobile camper, and it only takes a couple of minutes.

Independence

Regardless of whether you go hiking, trekking or biking you’ll get hungry right after your outdoor experience, with it's kitchen, your RoadPod makes you completely independent from the next petrol station, restaurant, etc.

A kitchen with everything you need

The RoadPod kitchen system includes everything that a kitchen needs:  Sink, cooker, chest fridge and lots of storage space for crockery, cutlery and food supplies.  You can use the RoadPod kitchen in a comfortable standing position protected by the boot lid or tailgate tent. Food odours stay outside your van. You can store your luggage on top of the kitchen which can still be used without limitations.

Double bed

Due to the low construction of the kitchen, it is also an extension to bed surface. This way you can create a large bed for two people.

You're ready to go

The Road Pod is completely assembled, you just have to put it into your van and you're ready to go.

Measurements:

Length 120,5 cm, depth 58,5 cm, height 53 cm
Weight: 59 kg

Standard decor:

Silver-grey (grey wood design surface) Further decors: Anthracite, wood design "Swiss", wood design (grey) pictures/videos to be added soon

Features;

Rinsing drawer:

  • Includes collapsible washing up bowl, pumping system with 16 litres water tank works with power supply from car battery
  • 30 kg soft close drawer (sink can still be used when luggage is stored on top of the kitchen)
  • drawer equipped with automatic return stop
  • Possibility to store washing-up utensils (washing-up liquid, sponge, etc.) or a showering top below the removable washing-up bowl

Integrated double pull out bed system;

  • Complete with foldaway double mattress with removable covers (machine washable)
  • Non slip grip mat (helps prevent mattress moving around)

Cutlery drawer:

  • Cutlery tray included

Cooker drawer:

  • Equipped with "Summit" portable gas stove (removable; no gas acceptance test required) includes 2 cartridges
  • 30 kg soft close drawer
  • Drawer equipped with double return stop
  • Wind break/splash guard for "Summit” stove
  • Grill top

Refrigerator drawer:

  • Includes "Webasto TB31" (AC/DC compressor cool box, 29 litres, External Dims 380mm x 585mm x 350mm, Internal Dims 290mm x 315mm x 270mm)
  • Drawer equipped with automatic return stop

Portable toilet

  • Thetford Porta Potti 345
  • Station port changeroom/toilet tent

Trolley

  • Comes with water proof "RoadPod" cover
  • Wheel brake
  • Slides unit in and out of the van
  • Leave the trolley at home or take it with you and put it in an awning as a storage unit

Delivery

Due to the potential for damage in transit the RoadPod is collect only, however we will be able to deliver ourselves shortly, delivery cost will depend on your location and whether we are able to do other deliveries in your vicinity which in turn will bring cost's down.

See the video
Product Availability: Road Pod presently is collection only, we will have a delivery option shortly, see details further down

Product Description:
Vango Kela and Idris Awning Footprint GP005

Groundsheet protector for Vango Kela campervan and motorhome awning

The Vango Idris/Kela Awning Footprint is specifically designed as protection for the integral groundsheet on the Vango Idris and Kela AirBeam Awnings for your Motorhome or Campervan. The footprint accurately marks where to begin pitching your Idris or Kela AirBeam awning, and in wet and muddy conditions facilitates the awning to be packed away mud free.

Features:

  • Hard wearing and easy to clean Polyethylene construction
  • Protection of integral groundsheet from sticks and stones etc.
  • Facilitates unpacking of the Awning on a clean dry surface
  • Clearly Marks the position when pitching the Awning
  • Folds into its compact carry bag for easy storage in your Caravan, campervan or Motorhome

Specifications:

  • 100% PE Construction
  • Weight 1.5kg
  • Pack size L54.0 x H9.0 x W12.0cm
  • Colour: Black
Product Warranty: Vango Kela footprint comes with a two year warranty
Product Availability: Vango Kela Footprint is sent 2-3 working days

Product Name: Sat-Fi UK + Fully Automatic Caravan Campervan and Motorhome Satellite Dome
Product Description:
SatFi UK Plus Fully Automatic Ultra Slimline TV Satellite Dome

Satellite TV wherever you go!

The SatFi UK + is an ultra slimline low profile TV satellite system which features simple operation along with on demand power, the UK Plus is also compatible with any satellite built in TV or reciever.

Features:

  • On demand feature with unique antenna power
  • Automatic satellite selection
  • Avtex DVB-S, Sky and Freesat PVR compatible
  • 2 Year RTB warranty
